original: āgataṃ. “Sīlādiguṇehī”ti sīla samādhi paññā vimutti vimuttiññāṇadassana guṇehi. “Iddhidhammehī”ti
analyzed: āgatam sīla ādi guṇehi iti sīla samādhi paññā vimutti vimutti ññāṇa dassana guṇehi iddhi dhammehi iti

original: Sampadāniṭṭhitā.
analyzed: sampadā aniṭṭhitā

original: 7. Sasaddhammagaṇuttamapade. Yathā=sasaṅghaṃlokanāyakaṃ namassissaṃ=ti etthasahasaddassa

original: paccānumodanādiṭhānesu=ahaṃ pubbedānaṃ nadadissaṃ, sīlaṃ narakkhissaṃ. - Anekajāti

original: Abbhūta tabbhāvecāyaṃ īkāro. Yathā, kāko setī bhavati, bako kaṇhībhavatīti. Ettha
analyzed: īkāraḥ yathā kākaḥ bhavati bakaḥ kaṇhībhavati iti ettha

original: nāma. “Abhivāditabhāvo”ti vutte tapaccayassa bahulaṃ atītakālavisayattā pubbeganthārambhakāle

original: dhamma saṅghānaṃpi therassa vandanāsiddhi dassitā hoti. “Abhivādetabba bhāvo”ti vuttepana

analyzed: asambhāventaḥ apica atiādim āha tattha apica ati kiñci vattabbam atthi iti attha jotane

original: Vacanatthe. Sadhano puriso, dhanavāpuriso-ti ādayo samāsataddhitasaddā yebhūyyena

analyzed: dīpakāḥ honti nahi appakena dhanena tathā voharanti tasmai idha api tathā

original: rūpaṃ atissayatthaṃ dassetuṃ “attanānimmitena…pe… saraṇabhūtenā”ti vuttaṃ. Tattha,

original: Tattha, “paranimmitenā”ti buddhanimmitenāti adhippāyo. “Tathā thomana”nti sasaddhamma

original: padamevahotīti yojanā.
analyzed: yojanā

original: Dhammavacanatthe. “Dhāretī”ti vahati. Gāthāyaṃ “rakkhatī”ti apāyādidukkhatorakkhati.

original: ambapupphaambapphalassa patiṭṭhā bhāvena pubbabhāga nissayo hoti. Kasmā, itoyevatassa

original: pubbabhāgūpanissayappaṭipadāhoti. Kasmā, itoyeva tassajātattā etthevasaṃ vaḍḍhitattā

original: viruḷiṃ vepullaṃ āpajjanti. Sabbete pathaviṃ nissāya pathaviṃ patiṭṭhāya. Evameva
analyzed: viruḷim vepullam āpajjanti sabbe ete pathavim nissāya pathavim patiṭṭhāya evam eva

original: ariyamaggo tveva saṅkhyaṃ gatoti vuttaṃ hoti.
analyzed: ariya maggo tu eva saṅkhyam gataḥ iti vuttam hoti

original: Paramatthapadavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

analyzed: divase sattā api atthi uppajjissamāna sattā api atthi tat ubhayam pi pāṇa vacane

original: 117. Paññindriye vattabbaṃ natthi.

original: Sobhaṇarāsimhianudīpanā niṭṭhitā.
118. Etaṃ parimāṇaṃ assāti ettāvaṃ. “Ettāvatā”ti ettāvantena-phasso, vedanā, saññā,tiādivacanakkamena.

analyzed: dhammānam nāyaka ttā jeṭṭhaka ttā

original: 119. Akusala cetasikesu. “Pacchimaṃ”ti sabbesupi dvādasā kusala cittesūti vacanaṃ.
analyzed: akusala cetasikesu pacchimaṃti sabbesu pi dvādasā kusala cittesu ti vacanam

original: sāmantajappana kuhanañca, iriyā pathasaṇṭhā pana kuhanañca. Tattha mahicchoyeva samāno

analyzed: ayam jhāna lābhī iti vā abhiññā lābhī iti vā arahā ati vā janaḥ mam sambhāvetu uti sambhāvanam

original: sahagataṃ, upekkhāsahagataṃ, domanassa sahagataṃ, sukhasahagataṃ, dukkha sahagatanti
analyzed: sahagatam upekkhā sahagatam domanassa sahagatam sukha sahagatam dukkha sahagatanti

original: evaṃ indriya bhedavasena. “Yesu dhammesū”ti sampayutta dhammesu. “Tesaṃ”ti sampayutta
analyzed: evam indriya bheda vasena yesu dhammesu iti sampayutta dhammesu tesam ti sampayutta

original: dhammānaṃ. Tattha sukhasampayuttā dhammā kāyika sukha sampayutta cetasika sukha sampayutta
analyzed: dhammānam tattha sukha sampayuttāḥ dhammā

original: vasena duvidhā. Evaṃ issaraṭṭhānabhūtānaṃ sampayutta dhammānaṃ duvidhattā anubhavana
analyzed: vasena duvidhā evam issara ṭṭhāna bhūtānam dhammānam duvidha ttā

original: bhede tīsu vedanāsu ekaṃ sukha vedanaṃ dvidhā bhinditvā sukhindriyaṃ somanassindriyanti
analyzed: bhede tīsu vedanāsu ekam sukha vedanam dvidhā bhinditvā

original: vuttaṃ. Dukkhasampayutta dhammesupi esevanayo. “Api cā”ti kiñci vattabbaṃ atthīti
analyzed: vuttam api ca ati kiñci vattabbam atthi iti

original: attho. “Tepī”ti upekkhā sampayuttāpi dhammā. Cakkhādi pasādakāyā nāma cakkhu sota
analyzed: atthaḥ te pi iti upekkhā sampayuttā api dhammā cakkha ādi pasāda kāyā nāma cakkhu

original: ghāna jivhā pasādakāyā. Tesu nissitā nāma cakkhu viññāṇa cittuppādādayo. “Sabbhāvā”ti
analyzed: ghāna jivhā pasāda kāyā tesu nissitā nāma cakkhu viññāṇa cittuppāda ādayo sabbhāvā ti

original: santabhāvato saṃvijjamāna bhāvato duvidhā hontīti yojanā. “Eka rasattā”ti majjhattabhāvena
analyzed: santa bhāvato saṃvijjamāna bhāvataḥ duvidhā honti iti yojanā majjhatta bhāvena

original: ekarasattā. “Itarānī”ti somanassa domanassa upekkhindriyāni. Sesamettha suviññeyyaṃ.
analyzed: ekarasa ttā itarāni iti somanassa domanassaḥ upekkhindriyāni sesam ettha su viññeyyam

original: 131. Hetusaṅgahe. “Suppatiṭṭhitabhāvasādhanaṃ”ti suṭṭhu patiṭṭhahantīti suppatiṭṭhitā.
analyzed: hetu saṅgahe suppatiṭṭhita bhāva sādhanam ti suṭṭhu patiṭṭhahanti iti suppatiṭṭhitā

original: Suppatiṭṭhita bhāvasādhanaṃ hetu kiccaṃ nāmāti yojanā. “Imepi dhammā”ti imepi cha
analyzed: suppatiṭṭhita bhāva sādhanam hetu kiccam nāma ati yojanā ime pi dhammā ati ime pi cha

original: hetu dhammā. “Tatthā”ti tesu ārammaṇesu, sādhenti. Tasmā suppatiṭṭhita bhāvasādhanaṃ
analyzed: hetu dhammā tattha ati tesu ārammaṇesu sādhenti tasmā suppatiṭṭhita bhāva sādhanam

original: hetukiccaṃ nāmāti vuttaṃ. “Apare panā”ti paṭṭhānaṭṭha kathāyaṃ āgato revatatthera
analyzed: hetu kiccam nāma ati vuttam apare pana ati kathā ayam āgataḥ revata thera

original: vādo. “Dhammānaṃ kusalādi bhāvasādhanaṃ”ti sahajātadhammānaṃ kusalabhāvasādhanaṃ
analyzed: vādaḥ dhammānam kusala ādi bhāva sādhanam ti sahajāta dhammānam kusala bhāva sādhanam

original: akusalabhāvasādhanaṃ abyākatabhāvasādhanaṃ. “Evaṃ sante”tiādi taṃ vādaṃ paṭikkhipantānaṃ
analyzed: akusala bhāva sādhanam abyākata bhāva sādhanam evam santa itiādi tam vādam paṭikkhipantānam

original: paṭikkhepavacanaṃ. “Yesa”nti mohamūla citta dvaye moho ca ahetuka cittuppāda rūpa
analyzed: paṭikkhepa vacanam yesanti moha mūla citta dvaye ca ahetuka cittuppāda rūpa

original: nibbānāni ca. “Na sampajjeyyā”ti sahajāta hetuno abhāvā tassa mohassa akusala bhāvo,
analyzed: nibbānāni ca na sampajjeyyāti sahajāta hetuno abhāvā tassa mohassa akusala bhāvo

original: itare sañca abyākata bhāvo na sampajjeyya. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti. Hetu nāma sahajāta dhammānaṃ
analyzed: itare sañca abyākata bhāvo na sampajjeyya idam vuttam hoti hetu nāma sahajāta dhammānam

original: kusalādibhāvaṃ sādhetīti vuttaṃ. Evaṃ sati, so moho sampayutta dhammānaṃ akusala
analyzed: kusala ādi bhāvam sādheti iti vuttam evam sati saḥ moho dhammānam akusala

original: bhāvaṃ sādheyya. Attano pana akusala bhāvaṃ sādhento sahajāto añño hetu natthi. Tasmā
analyzed: bhāvam sādheyya attano pana akusala bhāvam sādhento sahajātaḥ aññaḥ hetu natthi tasmā

original: tassa akusalabhāvo na sampajjeyya. Tathā ahetuka cittuppāda rūpa nibbānānañca abyākatabhāvaṃ
analyzed: tassa akusala bhāvaḥ na sampajjeyya tathā ahetuka cittuppāda rūpa nibbānānam ca abyākata bhāvaṃ

original: sādhento koci sahajāto hetu nāma natthīti tesampi abyākata bhāvo na sampajjeyya.
analyzed: sādhento koci sahajāto hetu nāma natthi iti tesampi abyākata bhāvaḥ na sampajjeyya

original: Na ca na sampajjati. Tasmā so theravādo na yuttoti. Ettha siyā. Soca moho attano
analyzed: na ca na sampajjati tasmā so thera vādaḥ na yuttaḥ ti ettha siyā so ca moho attano

original: dhammatāya akusalo hoti. Tāni ca ahetuka cittuppādarūpa nibbānāni attano dhammatāya
analyzed: dhamma tāya akusalaḥ hoti tāni ca ahetuka cittuppāda rūpa nibbānāni attanaḥ dhamma tāya

original: abyākatāni hontīti. Evaṃ sante, yathā te dhammā. Tathā aññepi dhammā attano dhammatāya
analyzed: abyākatāni honti iti evam sante yathā te dhammā tathā aññe pi dhammāḥ attanaḥ dhamma tāya

original: eva kusalā kusalā byākatā bhavissanti. Na cettha kāraṇaṃ atthi, yenakāraṇena te eva
analyzed: eva kusalā kusalāḥ byākatāḥ bhavissanti na ca ittha kāraṇam atthi yena kāraṇena te eva

original: dhammā attano dhammatāya akusalā byākatā honti. Aññe pana dhammā attano dhammatāya
analyzed: dhammāḥ attanaḥ dhamma tāya akusalāḥ byākatāḥ honti aññe pana dhammāḥ attanaḥ dhamma tāya

original: kusalā kusalā byākatā na honti, hetūhi eva hontīti. Tasmā tesaṃ sabbesampi kusalādi
analyzed: kusalā kusalā byākatāḥ na honti hetūhi eva honti iti tasmā tesam sabbesam pi kusala ādi

original: bhāvatthāya hetūhi payojanaṃ natthi. Tasmā so theravādo na yutto yevāti. Na kevalañca
analyzed: bhāva atthāya hetūhi payojanam natthi tasmā saḥ thera vādaḥ na yuttaḥ na kevalam ca

original: tasmiṃ theravāde ettako doso atthi. Atha kho aññopi doso atthīti dassetuṃ “yāni cā”tiādimāha.
analyzed: tasmin thera vāde ettakaḥ doso atthi atha kho aññaḥ api doso atthi iti dassetum yāni ca atiādim āha

original: Tatthāyaṃ adhippāyo. Sace dhammānaṃ kusalādi bhāvo sahajāta hetuppaṭibaddho siyā.
analyzed: tattha ayam adhippāyaḥ sace dhammānam kusala ādi bhāvo sahajāta hetu paṭibaddhaḥ siyā

original: Evaṃ sati, hetu paccaye kusala hetuto laddha paccayāni rūpāni kusalāni bhaveyyuṃ.
analyzed: evam sati hetu paccaye kusala hetutaḥ laddha paccayāni rūpāni kusalāni bhaveyyuṃ

original: Akusala hetuto laddha paccayāni rūpāni akusalāni bhaveyyuṃ. Na ca bhavanti. Tasmā
analyzed: akusala hetuto laddha paccayāni rūpāni akusalāni bhaveyyum na ca bhavanti tasmā

original: so vādo ayutto yevāti. Idāni puna taṃ theravādaṃ paggahetuṃ “yathāpanā”tiādimāha.
analyzed: saḥ vādaḥ ayuttaḥ idāni puna tam thera vādam paggahetum yathā apana ati ādim āha

original: “Dhammesū”ti catussacca dhammesu. Muyhanakiriyā nāma andhakāra kiriyā. Dhammacchando
analyzed: dhammesu iti catussacca dhammesu muyhanakiriyā nāma andhakāra kiriyā dhammacchando

original: nāma dānaṃ dātukāmo, sīlaṃ pūretukāmo, bhāvanaṃ bhāvetukāmo iccādinā pavatto chando.
analyzed: nāma dānam dātu kāmaḥ sīlam pūretu kāmaḥ bhāvanam bhāvetu kāmaḥ iccādinā pavattaḥ chandaḥ

original: “Akkhantī”ti akkhamanaṃ, arocanaṃ, amanāpo. Pāpa dhamma pāpā rammaṇa virodho nāma
analyzed: akkhantīti akkhamanaṃ arocanaṃ amanāpaḥ pāpa dhamma pāpa ārammaṇa virodhaḥ nāma

original: kāmarāgaṭṭhānīyehi sattavidha methuna dhammādīhi pāpa dhammehi ceva pañcakāmaguṇā
analyzed: kāma rāga ṭṭhānīyehi sattavidha methuna dhamma ādīhi pāpa dhammehi ca iva pañcakāmaguṇā

original: rammaṇe hi ca cittassa virodho, jeguccho paṭikūlo. Muyhanakiriyā pana ekanta akusala
analyzed: rammaṇe hi ca cittassa virodho jegucchaḥ paṭikūlaḥ muyhana kiriyā pana ekanta akusala

original: jātikā eva hoti. Ettāvatā mohamūla citta dvaye moho attano dhammatāya akusalo hotīti
analyzed: eva hoti ettāvatā moha mūla citta dvaye moho attanaḥ dhamma tāya akusalaḥ hoti iti

original: imamatthaṃ patiṭṭhāpeti. “Evaṃ sante”tiādikaṃ tattha dosāropanaṃ vidhamati. Idāni
analyzed: imam attham patiṭṭhāpeti evam santā iti ādikam tattha dosa āropanam vidhamati idāni

original: ahetuka cittuppāda rūpa nibbānāni attano dhammatāya abyākatāni hontīti imamatthaṃ
analyzed: ahetuka cittuppāda rūpa nibbānāni attanaḥ dhamma tāya abyākatāni honti iti imamatthaṃ

original: patiṭṭhāpetuṃ “yoca dhammo”tiādimāha. “Ettakamevā”ti aññaṃ dukkara kāraṇaṃ natthīti
analyzed: patiṭṭhāpetum yaḥ ca dhammaḥ tiādim āha ettakam eva ati aññam dukkara kāraṇam natthi iti

original: adhippāyo. “Ahetuka cittānaṃ”ti ahetuka cittuppādānaṃ. Attano dhammatāya eva siddho.
analyzed: adhippāyaḥ ahetuka cittānam ti ahetuka cittuppādānam attanaḥ dhamma tāya eva siddho

original: Ettāvatā-ahetuka. La. Nibbānāni attano dhammatāya abyākatāni hontī-ti imamatthaṃ
analyzed: ettāvatā ahetuka nibbānāni attanaḥ dhamma tāya abyākatāni honti iti imam attham

original: patiṭṭhāpeti. “Evaṃ sante”tiādi tattha dosāropanaṃ apaneti. Idāni sabbopi moho attano
analyzed: patiṭṭhāpeti evam santa itiādi tattha dosa āropanam apaneti idāni sabbaḥ api mohaḥ attano

original: dhammatāya akusala bhāveṭhatvā aññesaṃ icchā nāma atthi, akkhanti nāma atthīti evaṃ
analyzed: dhammatāya akusala bhāveṭhatvā aññesam icchā nāma atthi akkhanti nāma atthi iti evaṃ

original: vuttānaṃ icchā akkhanti dhammānampi akusala bhāvaṃ sādhetīti dassetuṃ “tattha moho”tiādimāha.
analyzed: vuttānam icchā akkhanti dhammānam pi akusala bhāvam sādheti iti dassetum tattha mohaḥ tiādim āha

original: “Muyhana nissandāni evā”ti muyhanakiriyāya nissandapphalāni eva. Na kevalaṃ so lobhādīnaṃ
analyzed: muyhana nissandāni eva ati muyhana kiriyāya nissanda phalāni eva na kevalam saḥ lobha ādīnam

analyzed: alobha ādīnam ca atiādi vuttam avijjā anusayena saha iva siddho ti tāni satta santāne avijjā anusaye

analyzed: appahīne kusalāni honti pahīne kiriyāni honti iti adhippāyaḥ idāni lobha dosānam alobha ādīnam ca

original: hetu kiccaṃ dassetuṃ “tāni pana lobhādīnī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Rajjana dussanānaṃ nissandāni
analyzed: hetu kiccam dassetum tāni pana lobha ādīni itiādi vuttam rajjana dussanānam nissandāni

original: rajjanādinissandāni. “Diṭṭhi mānādīnī”ti diṭṭhi māna issā macchariyādīni. Arajjana
analyzed: rajjana ādi nissandāni diṭṭhi māna ādīni iti diṭṭhi māna issā macchariya ādīni a rajjana

original: adussana amuyhanānaṃ nissandāni arajjanādi nissandāni. “Saddhādīnī”ti saddhā sati
analyzed: nissandāni arajjana ādi nissandāni saddhā ādīni iti saddhā sati

original: hiri ottappādīni. “Hetumukhenapī”ti ahetuka cittuppāda rūpa nibbānānaṃ abyākatabhāvo
analyzed: hiri ottappa ādīni hetu mukhena api iti ahetuka cittuppāda rūpa nibbānānaṃ abyākata bhāvaḥ

original: attano dhammatāya siddhoti vutto. Sahetuka vipāka kriyānaṃ abyākata bhāvo pana attano
analyzed: attanaḥ dhamma tāya siddho ti vutto sahetuka vipāka kriyānaṃ abyākata bhāvo pana attanaḥ

original: dhammatāya siddhotipi sahajāta hetūnaṃ hetu kiccena siddhotipi vattuṃ vaṭṭatīti adhippāyo.
analyzed: dhammatāya siddhotipi sahajāta hetūnam hetu kiccena siddhotipi vattum vaṭṭati iti adhippāyaḥ

original: Vibhāva nipāṭhe. “Maggitabbo”ti gavesitabbo. Atha tesaṃ kusalādi bhāvo sesasampayutta
analyzed: nipāṭhe maggitabbaḥ iti gavesitabbaḥ atha tesam kusala ādi bhāvaḥ sesa sampayutta

original: hetuppaṭi baddho siyāti yojanā. “Appaṭi baddho”ti hetunā appaṭi baddho. “Kusalādibhāvo”ti
analyzed: hetu paṭi baddho siyāti yojanā appaṭi baddhaḥ ti hetunā appaṭi baddhaḥ kusala ādi bhāvo ti

original: nibbānānaṃ. Idāni ‘yāni ca laddhahetu paccayānī’tiādi vacanaṃ paṭikkhipanto “yathācā”tiādimāha.
analyzed: nibbānānam idāni yāni ca laddha hetu paccayāni itiādi vacanam paṭikkhipantaḥ yathā ca ati ādim āha

original: “Rūpārūpa dhammesū”ti niddhāraṇe bhumma vacanaṃ. “Arūpa dhammesu evā”ti niddhāraṇīyaṃ.
analyzed: rūpa arūpa dhammesu iti niddhāraṇe bhumma vacanaṃ arūpa dhammesu eva ati niddhāraṇīyam

original: Na rūpa dhammesu pharanti. Evaṃ sati, kasmā te rūpa dhammā jhānapaccayuppannesu vuttāti
analyzed: na rūpa dhammesu pharanti evam sati kasmā te rūpa dhammā jhāna paccayuppannesu vuttā ati

original: āha “te panā”tiādiṃ. Sesamettha suviññeyyaṃ. “Taṃ pana tesaṃ”ti tesaṃ haṃsādīnaṃ
analyzed: āha te pana ati ādim sesam ettha su viññeyyam tam pana tesam ti tesam haṃsa ādīnam

original: taṃ vaṇṇavisesaṃ. “Yoniyo”ti mātāpitu jātiyo. “Abyākatānaṃ panāti sabbaṃ”ti abyākatānaṃ

original: baddho cāti daṭṭhabbanti idaṃ sabbaṃ. “Vutta pakkhepatati yevā”ti tasmiṃ pakkhe antogadhamevāti adhippāyo.

original: 132. Kiccasaṅgahe. Tasmiṃ parikkhīṇeti sambandho. “Kammassā”ti kammantarassa. Cutassa
analyzed: kicca saṅgahe tasmin parikkhīṇā iti sambandhaḥ kammassa ati kammantarassa cutassa

original: ādikoṭiyā paṭisandhāna vasena. Bhavasantānassa pavattīti sambandho. Kathaṃ pavattīti
analyzed: ādi koṭiyā paṭisandhāna vasena bhava santānassa pavatti iti sambandho katham pavatti iti

original: āha “yāva taṃ kammaṃ”tiādiṃ. “Avicchedappavatti paccayaṅgabhāvenā”ti avicchedappavattiyā

original: padhāna paccaya saṅkhātena aṅgabhāvena. Etena bhavaṅgapade aṅgasaddassa atthaṃ vadati.
analyzed: padhāna paccaya saṅkhātena aṅga bhāvena etena bhavaṅga pade aṅga saddassa attham vadati

original: Tenāha “tassahī”tiādiṃ. “Tassā”ti bhavaṅgassa. Āvajjanaṃ āvaṭṭananti eko vacanattho.
analyzed: tena āha tassa hi itiādim tassa ati bhavaṅgassa āvajjanam āvaṭṭanan ti ekaḥ vacana atthaḥ

original: Taṃ vā āvajjetīti eko. “Taṃ”ti citta santānaṃ. Āvaṭṭati vā taṃ etthāti eko. Āvaṭṭati
analyzed: tam vai āvajjeti iti ekaḥ citta santānam āvaṭṭati vā tam ettha ati ekaḥ āvaṭṭati

original: vā taṃ etenāti eko. “Taṃ”ti citta santānaṃ. Āvajjeti vāti eko. “Voṭṭhabbanaṃ”ti vi-ava-ṭhapanaṃti
analyzed: vā tam etena ati ekaḥ citta santānam āvajjeti vā ati ekaḥ voṭṭhabbanaṃti viavaṭhapanaṃti

original: padacchedo. Vibhāvani vicāraṇāyaṃ. “Ekāvajjana parikamma cittato”ti maggena vā abhiññāya
analyzed: maggena vā abhiññāya

original: vā ekaṃ samānaṃ āvajjanaṃ assāti viggaho. Tassaṃ vīthiyaṃ ‘āvajjanaṃ, parikammaṃ,
analyzed: vā ekam samānam āvajjanam assa ati viggahaḥ tassam vīthiyam āvajjanam parikammam

original: upacāro, anulomaṃ, gotrabhū,ti ettha parikamma javanacittaṃ idha parikamma cittanti
analyzed: upacāraḥ anulomam gotrabhūti ettha parikamma javana cittam idha parikamma cittanti

original: vuttaṃ. “Tānī”ti maggā bhiññājavanāni. “Tatthā”ti tasmiṃ vibhāvani pāṭhe. “Dīghaṃ
analyzed: vuttam tāni iti maggāḥ bhiññā javanāni tattha ati tasmin vibhāvani pāṭhe dīgham

original: addhānaṃ”ti sakalarattiyaṃ vā sakala divasaṃ vā niddokkamana vasena dīghaṃ kālaṃ.
analyzed: sakalarattiyam vā sakala divasam vā niddokkamana vasena dīgham kālam

original: Sesamettha suviññeyyaṃ. “Paṭisandhiyāṭhānaṃ”ti paṭisandhikiccassa ṭhānaṃ. Kālohi

original: sahuppannaṃ vā parassa cittaṃ āvajjati kinti yojanā. “Kiñcetthā”ti ettha vacane kiñci

original: vattabbaṃ atthīti attho. Yadi tāva āvajjanañca javanāni cāti adhikāro. “Tañhi cittaṃ”ti
analyzed: vattabbam atthi iti atthaḥ yadi tāva āvajjanam ca javanāni ca ati tat hi cittam ti

original: parassa cittaṃ. “Evampi bhinnamevā”ti javanānaṃ dhammato bhinnameva. Ettha aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
analyzed: parassa cittam evam pi bhinnam eva ati javanānam dhammataḥ bhinnam eva ettha aṭṭhakathā ayam

original: vinicchitanti sambandho. Taṃ cittaṃ niruddhampi javanānampi paccuppannameva hotīti
analyzed: vinicchitam ti sambandho tam cittam niruddham pi paccuppannam eva hoti iti

original: yojanā. “Addhāvasena gahitaṃ”ti addhā paccuppanna vasena gahitaṃ. “Santativasena
analyzed: yojanā addhā vasena gahitam ti addhā paccuppanna vasena gahitam santati vasena

original: gahitaṃ”ti santati paccuppannavasena gahitaṃ. Ācariyānandamate. Sabbesampi āvajjana
analyzed: gahitam ti santati paccuppanna vasena gahitam ācariya ānanda mate sabbesam pi āvajjana

original: javanānaṃ. Cittameva hoti, tasmā dhammato abhinnaṃ. Paccuppannañca hoti, tasmā kālato
analyzed: javanānam cittam eva hoti tasmai dhammataḥ abhinnam paccuppannam ca hoti tasmai kālataḥ

original: abhinnanti vuttaṃ hoti. Anantarapaccaye atīto ca paccuppanno ca khaṇa vasena yujjati.
analyzed: abhinnanti vuttam hoti anantara paccaye atītaḥ ca paccuppannaḥ ca khaṇa vasena yujjati

original: Yadi addhāsantati vasena yujjeyya, paccuppanno dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa anantara
analyzed: yadi addhā santati vasena yujjeyya paccuppannaḥ dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa anantara

original: paccayena paccayoti vutto bhaveyya. Kasmā, ekāvajjana vīthiyañhi sabbāni cittāni
analyzed: paccayena paccayaḥ ti vuttaḥ bhaveyya kasmai ekāvajjana vīthiyam hi sabbāni cittāni

original: addhāsantati vasena paccuppannāni eva hontīti.
analyzed: addhāsantati vasena paccuppannāni eva honti iti

original: 138. Appanāvāre. “Appanā javanaṃ”ti kammapadaṃ. “Tadā rammaṇaṃ”ti kattupadaṃ. “Indriya
analyzed: appanāvāre appanā javanaṃ ti kamma padam tadā rammaṇaṃ ti kattu padam indriya

original: samatādīhī”ti saddhādīnaṃ pañcannaṃ indriyānaṃ aññamaññaṃ anati vattanavasena samatādīhi.
analyzed: samatā ādīhi iti saddhā ādīnam pañcannam indriyānam aññam aññam an ati vattana vasena samatā ādīhi

original: “Parito”ti samantato. “Upeccā”ti upagantvā. Appanaṃ vahituṃ janetuṃ samattha bhāvo
analyzed: paritas ti samantataḥ upecca ati upagantvā appanam vahitum janetum samattha bhāvaḥ

original: appanāvahasamatthabhāvo. “Yassa pavattiyā”ti yassa upacāra javanassa pavattito. “Aciraṃ
analyzed: appanā vaha samattha bhāvaḥ yassa pavattiyā ati yassa upacāra javanassa pavattitaḥ aciram

original: kālaṃ”ti acirekāle. Paritta jātikā nāma kāmāvacarajāti. “Gottaṃ”ti kammakattu padaṃ.
analyzed: acirekāle paritta jātikā nāma kāmāvacara jāti gottaṃti kamma kattu padaṃ

original: “Abhibhuyyatī”ti bhāvanā balena abhibhuyyamānaṃ hoti. Abhimaddīyamānaṃ hotīti attho.
analyzed: abhibhuyyati iti bhāvanā balena abhibhuyyamānam hoti abhimaddīyamānam hoti iti attho

original: “Chijjatī”ti idaṃ pana abhibhavanassa sikhāpatta dassanaṃ. Yāva taṃ gottaṃ chedaṃ
analyzed: chijjati iti idam pana abhibhavanassa sikhāpatta dassanam yāva tam gottam chedam

original: pāpuṇāti, tāva abhibhuyyati, maddīyatīti vuttaṃ hoti. Gottaṃ abhibhavatīti gotrabhūtipi
analyzed: pāpuṇāti tāva maddīyati iti vuttam hoti gottam abhibhavati iti

original: yujjati. “Pañcamaṃ”ti pañcame cittavāre. “Tadāhi javanaṃ patitaṃ nāma hotī”ti pakatiyā
analyzed: pañcamaṃti pañcame citta vāre javanam patitam nāma hoti iti

original: javanappavattināma sattakkhattu paramo hoti. Catutthañca muddhapattaṃ. Pañcamato
analyzed: javanappavatti nāma satta kkhattu paramaḥ hoti catuttham ca muddha pattam pañcamataḥ

original: paṭṭhāya patitaṃ. Tasmā tasmiṃ pañcamavāre javanaṃ patitaṃ nāma hoti. “Dutīyenā”ti
analyzed: paṭṭhāya patitam tasmai tasmin pañcama vāre javanam patitam nāma hoti dutīyena ati

original: dutīyena eva saddena. “Dutīyaṃ”ti dutīye cittavāre. Tadā anulomaṃ pathamajavanaṃ
analyzed: dutīyena eva dutīye citta vāre tadā anulomam pathama javanam

original: hotīti vuttaṃ “aladdhā sevanaṃ anuloma”nti. “Etenevā”ti etena eva sadda dvaye neva.
analyzed: hoti iti vuttam aladdhā sevanam anulomanti etena iva ati etena eva sadda dvaye na iva

original: Aṭṭhasāliniyaṃ pana anuññātā viya dissati. Vuttañhi tattha. Mandapaññassa cattāri
analyzed: aṭṭhasāliniyam pana anuññātā viya dissati vuttam hi tattha manda paññassa cattāri

original: anulomāni honti, pañcamaṃ gotrabhu, chaṭṭhaṃ maggacittaṃ, sattamaṃ phalanti. “Itaraṭṭhakathāsū”ti
analyzed: anulomāni honti pañcamam gotra bhu chaṭṭham magga cittam sattamam phalanti itara ṭṭhakathāsu iti

original: vinayaṭṭha kathādīsu. “Paṭisiddhattā”ti pañcamaṃ gotra bhuppavattiyā paṭisiddhattā
analyzed: vinaya ṭṭha kathā ādīsu paṭisiddha ttā ti pañcamam gotra bhu pavattiyā

original: ādimhi aṭṭhannaṃ aññatrasmiṃti vuttattā idha niruddheti padaṃ avassaṃ icchitabbamevāti
analyzed: ādimhi aṭṭhannam aññatrasmin ti vutta ttā idha niruddhā iti padam avassam icchitabbam eva ati

original: vuttaṃ “niruddhe anantaramevāti padacchedo”ti. Anantara saddassa ca niccaṃ sambandhāpekkhattā
analyzed: vuttam niruddhe anantaram eva ati padacchedaḥ ti anantara saddassa ca niccam

original: tamevapadaṃ vibhatti pariṇāmena adhikatanti āha “niruddhassāti atthato laddhamevā”ti.
analyzed: tam eva padam vibhatti pariṇāmena āha niruddhassa ati atthataḥ laddham eva ati

original: “Vasibhūtāpī”ti vasibhūtāpi samānā. “Ekavāraṃ javitvā”ti idaṃ lokiyappanāvasena vuttaṃ.
analyzed: vasi bhūtā api iti vasi bhūtā api samānā eka vāram javitvā iti idam lokiya ppanā vasena vuttam

original: Lokuttara appanāpana sattamampi uppajjatiyeva. Mūlaṭīkā pāṭhe “bhūmantarapattiyā”ti
analyzed: lokuttara appanāpana sattamam pi uppajjatiyā iva mūlaṭīkā pāṭhe

original: gotrabhu cittaṃ kāmabhūmi hoti. Appanāpana mahaggatabhūmi vā lokuttarabhūmi vā hoti.
analyzed: gotrabhu cittam kāma bhūmi hoti mahaggata bhūmi vā lokuttara bhūmi vā hoti

original: Evaṃ bhūmantarapattiyā. “Ārammaṇantara laddhiyā”ti phalasamāpatti vīthiyaṃ phalajavanaṃ
analyzed: evam phala samāpatti vīthiyam

original: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tatthahi purimāni anuloma javanāni saṅkhārā rammaṇāni honti. Phalajavanaṃ
analyzed: sandhāya vuttam tattha hi purimāni anuloma javanāni saṅkhārāḥ rammaṇāni honti phala javanam

original: nibbānārammaṇaṃ. Idañca kāraṇamattameva. Yathāvutta leḍḍupamā eva idha yuttarūpāti
analyzed: nibbāna ārammaṇam idam ca kāraṇa mattam eva yathāvutta leḍḍupamā eva idha yutta rūpā ati

original: daṭṭhabbaṃ. “Na kho panetaṃ evaṃ daṭṭhabba”nti etaṃ atthajātaṃ na kho evaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
analyzed: daṭṭhabbam na kho pana etam evam daṭṭhabbanti etam attha jātam na kho evam daṭṭhabbam

original: “Anaddhanīyā”ti addhānaṃ dīghakālaṃ nakha mantīti anaddhanīyā. Asārā. Asārattā eva
analyzed: anaddhanīyā ati dīgha kālam nakha manti iti anaddhanīyāḥ asārāḥ a sārattāḥ eva

original: sīghataraṃ ruhanti. Sīghataraṃ vuddhiṃ viruḷhiṃ āpajjanti. Sāravantā pana sārena
analyzed: sīghataram ruhanti sīghataram vuddhim viruḷhim āpajjanti sāravantā pana sārena

original: saha vaḍḍhamānattā sīghataraṃ naruhanti. Sīghataraṃ vuddhiṃ viruḷhiṃ nā pajjanti.
analyzed: saha sīghataram sīghataram sīghataram vuddhim viruḷhim nā pajjanti

original: Tenāha “ekavassajīvino”tiādiṃ. “Evamevā”tiādīsu “patitajavanesū”ti pañcama chaṭṭha
analyzed: tena āha eka vassa jīvino tiādim evam eva ati ādīsu patita javanesu iti

original: sattama javanesu. “Ettha cā”tiādīsu. “Supakkasālibhatta sadisānī”ti yathā sālibhattāni
analyzed: sattama javanesu ettha cāti ādīsu supakka sālibhatta sadisāni iti yathā sālibhattāni

original: supakkattā eva mudutarāni hutvā dubbalāni aciraṭṭhitikāni. Tasmiṃ divasepi pūtibhāvaṃ
analyzed: su pakkattā eva mudutarāni hutvā dubbalāni aciraṭṭhitikāni tasmin divase pi pūti bhāvam

original: gacchanti. Evaṃ appanā javanāni. “Yasmā cā”tiādīsu. “Duvidhassa niyamassā”ti javananiyamassa
analyzed: gacchanti evam appanā javanāni yasmā ca ati ādīsu duvidhassa niyamassa ati javana niyamassa

original: ca kālaniyamassa ca. “Paṭisandhiyā anantara paccaya bhāvino”ti sattama javana cetanā

analyzed: cittassa anantara paccaya bhāvena avassam bhavissamānassa ati attho idañca kāraṇa

analyzed: mattam eva mahā ṭīkā vacanam pana kiñci vattabba rūpan ti na paṭikkhittam nirantara ppavattānam ti

analyzed: ādīsu bhinnā asadisā vedanā yesam tāni bhinna vedanāni āsevana paccanīkānam ti

original: āsevana paccayappaṭi pakkhānaṃ. Abhinnā vedanā yesanti viggaho. Kriyajavanānantaraṃ

original: arahattaphalaṃ phalasamāpatti vīthiyaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Sesametthasuviññeyyaṃ.
analyzed: arahatta phalam phala samāpatti vīthiyam daṭṭhabbam sesam ettha su viññeyyam

original: 139. “Sabbathā pī”tiādīsu. Loke majjhimake hi mahājanehi icchitampi kiñci ārammaṇaṃ
analyzed: sabbathā pīti ādīsu loke majjhimake hi mahājanehi icchitam pi kiñci ārammaṇam

analyzed: kamma padam kiñci iti kiñci rūpam kismiñci iti kasmiṃci ekasmin pupphe tena vāti

original: tena vā sukhasamphassena vatthena. Sesamettha suviññeyyaṃ.
analyzed: tena vā sukha samphassena vatthena sesam ettha su viññeyyam

original: “Vedanāniyamopanā”tiādīsu. “Ādāse mukhanimittassa viyā”ti yathā ādāse mukha nimittassa
analyzed: vedanā niyama upanāti ādīsu ādāse mukha nimittassa viyāti yathā ādāse mukha nimittassa

analyzed: calana cavana ādi yogaḥ ca yathāmukham eva siddhaḥ tathā vedanā

original: yogo pana yathārammaṇameva siddhoti yojanā. Tattha “vedanāyogo”ti nānāvedanāyogo.

original: “Kappetvā”ti cintetvā. “Pakappetvā”ti nānappakārato cintetvā. Na kevalañca vipākānaṃ
analyzed: kappetvā iti cintetvā pakappetvā ati nānā pakārato cintetvā na kevalam ca vipākānaṃ

original: eva yathārammaṇaṃ vedanā yogo hotīti yojanā.
analyzed: eva yathārammaṇam vedanā yogaḥ hoti iti yojanā

original: “Ayañcā”tiādīsu. “Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pī”ti paṭṭhāna aṭṭhakathāyampi. “Tadārammaṇa vasenā”ti
analyzed: ayam ca ati ādīsu aṭṭhakathā idam pi iti paṭṭhāna aṭṭhakathā idam pi tad ārammaṇa vasena ati

original: tadārammaṇavasena pavattānanti pāṭhaseso. “Pañcannaṃ”ti somanassa santīraṇena saddhiṃ
analyzed: tad ārammaṇa vasena pavattānam ti pāṭha sesaḥ santīraṇena saddhiṃ

original: cattāri mahāvipāka somanassāni sandhāya vuttaṃ. “Pakati nīhārenā”ti pakatiyā niccakālaṃ
analyzed: cattāri mahā vipāka somanassāni sandhāya vuttam pakati nīhārena ati pakatiyā nicca kālam

original: pavattappakārena. Pāḷipāṭhe. Bhāvitāni indriyāni yenāti bhāvitindriyo. “Manāpaṃ”ti

original: manorammaṃ. “Amanāpaṃ”ti amanorammaṃ. Vihareyyanti sace kaṅkhatīti sambandho. “Paṭikūle”ti
analyzed: manorammam amanāpam amanorammam vihareyyanti sace kaṅkhati iti sambandho paṭikūlā iti

original: amanāpe. “Appaṭikūla saññī”ti manāpasaññī. Evaṃ sesesu. “Tesaṃ”ti khīṇāsavānaṃ. Pāḷipāṭhe.
analyzed: amanāpe saññī iti manāpa saññī evam sesesu tesam ti khīṇāsavānam pāḷi pāṭhe

original: “Sumano”ti somanassito. “Dummano”ti domanassito. Pāḷipāṭhe. “Mettāyavā pharatī”ti
analyzed: sumanaḥ ti somanassitaḥ dummanaḥ ti domanassitaḥ pāḷi pāṭhe mettā yavā pharati iti

original: ayaṃ satto averohotūtiādinā mettācittena vā pharati. “Dhātuso upasaṃharatī”ti yathā
analyzed: ayam sattaḥ upasaṃharati iti yathā

original: ma ma kāyopi catudhātu samussayo hoti. Tattha ekāpi dhātu nāma paṭikūlā vā appaṭikūlā
analyzed: ma ma kāyaḥ api catu dhātu samussayaḥ hoti tattha ekā api dhātu nāma paṭikūlā vā appaṭikūlā

original: vā na hoti. Kevalaṃ tuccha suñña sabhāvamattā hoti. Evameva imassa sattassa kāyopītiādinā
analyzed: vā na hoti kevalam hoti evam eva imassa sattassa

original: dhātu so upasaṃharati. “Asubhāya vā”ti asubha bhāvanāya vā. Asubha bhāvanā cittena

original: vāti vuttaṃ hoti. “Asubhāyā”ti vā tassa asubhabhāvatthāya. Devanāṭakā devaccharā
analyzed: vā iti vuttam hoti asubhāya ati vā tassa asubha bhāva tthāya devanāṭakāḥ devaccharāḥ

original: nāma. Kuthitāni kuṭṭhāni yesaṃ tāni kuthita kuṭṭhāni. “Sarīrānī”ti kāyaṅgāni. Kuthita
analyzed: nāma kuthitāni kuṭṭhāni yesam tāni kuthita kuṭṭhāni sarīrāni iti kāyaṅgāni kuthita

original: kuṭṭhāni sarīrāni yassa so kuthitakuṭṭhasarīro. “Kuthitānī”ti abbhukkiraṇāni. Vedanā
analyzed: kuṭṭhāni sarīrāni yassa so kuthita kuṭṭha sarīro kuthitāni iti abbhut kiraṇāni vedanā

original: yuttāni honti iti apare vadantīti yojanā. Tasmā paccayo hotīti sambandho. Kathaṃ
analyzed: yuttāni honti iti apare vadanti iti yojanā tasmā paccayaḥ hoti iti sambandho katham

original: paccayo hotīti āha “yathā ānisaṃsa dassanenā”tiādiṃ. Tattha “aṭṭhakathāyaṃ”ti visuddhi
analyzed: paccayaḥ hoti iti āha yathā ānisaṃsa dassanena atiādim tattha aṭṭhakathāyanti

original: maggaṭṭhakathāyaṃ. “Buddhasubuddhatā dassanenā”ti attano satthubhūtassa buddhassa
analyzed: magga ṭṭhakathā ayam buddha subuddha tā dassanena ati attano satthu bhūtassa buddhassa

original: subuddhatā dassanena. “Attasampatti dassanenā”ti mayaṃ pana evarūpā dukkhā muttāmhāti
analyzed: su buddha tā dassanena atta sampatti dassanena ati mayam pana evarūpāḥ dukkhāḥ muttāmha ati

original: evaṃ attano sampatti dassanena. “Aṭṭhikaṅkalikapetarūpe”ti nimmaṃ salohite aṭṭhipuñjapetasarīre.
analyzed: evam attanaḥ sampatti dassanena aṭṭhi kaṅkalika peta rūpe ti nimmam sa lohite aṭṭhi puñja peta sarīre

original: “Kuṭṭhino”ti kuṭṭhasarīrassa. “Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ”ti dhammapada aṭṭhakathāyaṃ. Ati iṭṭhe
analyzed: kuṭṭhino ti kuṭṭha sarīrassa aṭṭhakathāyanti dhamma pada aṭṭhakathāyan ati iṭṭhe

original: devacchara vaṇṇādike. Ati aniṭṭhe kuthitakuṭṭhasarīrādike. “Vatthu bhūto”ti uppattiṭṭhāna
analyzed: vaṇṇa ādike ati aniṭṭhe kuthita kuṭṭha sarīra ādike vatthu uppatti ṭṭhāna

original: bhūto. “Tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ”ti kattu atthesāmivacanaṃ. “Tadubhayaṃ pī”ti ubhayaṃ
analyzed: tesam tesam sattānam ti tat ubhayam ubhayam

original: taṃ gahaṇaṃpi. “Tesaṃ”ti tesaṃ lokiya mahājanānaṃ. “Vipallāsavaseneva hotī”ti devaccharavaṇṇādīsu

original: kuvuccati pathavī. Pathavi gatāni ratanabhaṇḍāni yesaṃ teti viggaho. “Dānavarakkhasā”ti
analyzed: pathavī pathavi gatāni ratana bhaṇḍāni yesam te iti viggahaḥ dānava rakkhasā ati

original: danunāmadevadhītāya apaccanti atthena dānava nāmakā rakkhasā. Avarujjhanti antarāyaṃ

original: karontīti avaruddhakā. “Vigaccharūpo”ti vipannavaṇṇo. “Nihīnakammakatā”ti nihīnānipāpakammāni

original: vuttaṃ hoti. “Gocarappasutakāle”ti gocaratthāya vicaritakāle. “Jutiatthenā”ti vijjotanaṭṭhena.

original: Vasūni dhanāni dhārentīti vasundharā. Vasundharā ca te deva yakkhā cāti viggaho.

analyzed: soṇaḥ vuccati su nakho satte nerayike vā kāmañca

original: hotī”ti kiñcāpi hotīti attho. “Nibandhanokāso”ti niccasambandhanokāso. “Samudāgatesū”ti

original: saha pavattattā. “Vasaṃ vattentī”ti icchaṃ pūrentīti vuttaṃ hoti.

original: “Pure”ti sammukhaṭṭhāne. Taṃ pana ṭhānaṃ uccaṭṭhānaṃ nāma hotīti āha “ucceṭhāne”ti.

analyzed: brahma bhūmīsu tasmin dutīya tale ābhāti sarīra ābhāḥ niccharanti

original: aṅgapaccaṅgehi niggacchanti. “Acala saṇṭhitā”ti dutīya tale viya calitā na hoti.

original: etasmiṃ catutthatalepi. “Āyu vemattatāyā”ti āyuppamāṇanānattassa. “Oḷārikānaṃ”ti

analyzed: etesan ti avihā kim vihaññanam nāma ati āha samatha vipassanā kammesu a vipphārika tā

original: pattī”ti. Cittassa avipphāratā pajjanaṃ nāma natthīti vuttaṃ hoti. “Pasāda dibba
analyzed: patti iti cittassa a vipphāra tā pajjanam nāma natthi iti vuttam hoti pasāda dibba

analyzed: dhamma paññā cakkhūhi iti pasāda cakkhu dibba cakkhu dhammacakkhu paññā cakkhū

original: Katamesaṃ vipattīti. Uppannānampi cakkhu sotānaṃ vipatti. Kenakāraṇena vipattīti.

analyzed: vuttam virūpāḥ hutvā ti te vaṇṇataḥ api dubbaṇṇāḥ honti saṇṭhānataḥ api dussaṇṭhānāḥ jīvikataḥ api

original: kicchajīvikātiādinā vipannarūpā hutvā. ‘Vivasā hutvā nipatantī’ti vinipātikātipi

original: yesaṃ atthi, te vemānikā. Te pana puññāpuññamissaka kammena nibbattattā keci divā
analyzed: yesam atthi te vemānikā te pana kammena nibbatta ttā keci divā

original: dibbasukhaṃ anubhavanti, rattiṃ petadukkhaṃ. Keci rattiṃ dibbasukhaṃ anubhavanti,
analyzed: dibba sukham anubhavanti rattim peta dukkham keci rattim dibba sukham anubhavanti

analyzed: divā peta dukkhanti parehi dattam dinnam puñña phalam upanissāya jīvanti iti para dattu upajīvinaḥ

original: “Parehi dinnaṃ puññapphalaṃ”ti ñātakehi puññaṃ katvā idaṃ me puññaṃ petānaṃ kālaṅkatānaṃ

analyzed: ñātīnam dedhi iti evam dinnam puñña pphalam sakala cakkavāḷa pariyāpannā eka bhūmakā ati

original: yathā tāvatiṃsābhūmi nāma sabba cakkavāḷesupi atthi. Sabbāpi dibbena vassasahassena
analyzed: yathā tāvatiṃsābhūmī nāma atthi sabbā api dibbena vassa sahassena

original: ekaāyu paricchedo hoti. Imasmiṃ cakkavāḷe vattabbaṃ natthi. Na tathā nirayesu vā

analyzed: vā petti visaye vā asura kāye vā manussesu vā bhummadevesu vā eka paricchedaḥ

analyzed: nāma atthi catunnam apāyānaṃ āyu pamāṇa gaṇanāya niyamaḥ na atthi iti vuttam na nu brahma

analyzed: saṃyutte kokālikam bhikkhum ārabbha bhagavatā vuttaḥ dasannam nirayānam visum visum

original: atthīti. Saccaṃ atthi. Te pana dasanirayā avīciniraye pariyāpannā hutvā tassa padesamattā
analyzed: atthi iti saccam atthi te pana dasa nirayāḥ avīci niraye pariyāpannāḥ hutvā tassa padesa mattā

original: honti. Na tehi pade samattehi sakalo avīcinirayo niyatāyu parimāṇoti sakkā vattuṃ.
analyzed: honti na tehi pade samattehi sakalaḥ avīci nirayaḥ niyata āyu sakkā vattum

original: Api ca sopi tesaṃ āyuparicchedo avīcibhūmiyā niyāmena siddho na hoti. Tena tena kammaviseseneva
analyzed: api ca saḥ api tesam āyu paricchedaḥ avīci bhūmiyā niyāmena siddhaḥ na hoti tena tena kamma visesena iva

original: siddho. Tasmā yaṃ vuttaṃ “tattha yebhūyyena kammappamāṇattā”ti, taṃ su vuttaṃ hoti.
analyzed: siddhaḥ tasmai yam vuttam tattha yebhūyyena kamma ppamāṇa ttā ti tat su vuttam hoti

original: Tenāha “tattha nirayesū”tiādiṃ. “Evaṃ sante”ti na itara dīpavāsīnaṃ āyukappassa ārohaṇañca
analyzed: tena āha tattha nirayesu utiādim evam santa iti na āyu kappassa ārohaṇam ca

original: orohaṇañca atthīti vutte satīti attho. Samācāro nāma dasasucaritāni. Visamācāro nāma
analyzed: orohaṇam ca atthi iti vutte sati iti attho samācāraḥ nāma dasa sucaritāni visamācāraḥ nāma

original: dasaduccaritāni. Tesaṃ nissandabhūtā sampattivipattiyoti sambandho. “Tesaṃ pī”ti
analyzed: dasa duccaritāni tesam nissanda bhūtā sampatti vipattiyaḥ ti sambandhaḥ tesam pi iti

original: itara dīpavāsīnaṃpi. So evaparicchedoti āpajjati. Na ca sakkā tathā bhavituṃ. Ādikappakāle
analyzed: saḥ eva paricchedo ti āpajjati na ca sakkā tathā bhavitum ādi kappa kāle

original: sabbesampi catudīpa vāsīnaṃ asaṅkhyeyyāyukatā sambhavatoti. Atha itaradīpavāsīnampi

original: āyukappassa ārohaṇaṃ orohaṇañca atthi. Evaṃ sati, etarahipi tesaṃ āyukappo jambudīpavāsīnaṃ
analyzed: āyu kappassa ārohaṇaṃ orohaṇañca atthi evam sati etarahi pi tesam āyu kappo jambudīpa vāsīnam

original: āyukappena ekagatiko siyāti codanā. Nissandamattattātiādi parihāro. Natthi idaṃ mama
analyzed: āyu kappena eka gatikaḥ siyāti codanā nissanda matta ttā atiādi parihāraḥ natthi idam mama

original: idaṃ mamāti pavattā pāṭipuggalikataṇhā etesanti “amamā”. “Apariggahā”ti puttadārādipariggaharahitā.

original: 153. “Etthā”tiādīsu. “Dhammasaṅgahe”ti dhammasaṅgaṇi pāḷiyaṃ. “Dassanenā”ti sotāpatti
analyzed: ettha atiādīsu dhamma saṅgahe iti dhamma saṅgaṇi pāḷiyam dassanena ati sa utāpatti

original: maggaññāṇena. “Taṃ”ti uddhacca cetanaṃ. “Bhāvanāyā”ti uparimaggattayasaṅkhātāya bhāvanāya.
analyzed: magga ññāṇena tat ti uddhat ca cetanam bhāvanāya ati upari magga ttaya saṅkhātāya bhāvanāya

original: Pāḷipāṭhe. “Cittuppādā”ti cittacetasikā vuccanti. “Siyā”ti ekacceti atthe nipāta
analyzed: pāḷi pāṭhe cittuppādā ti citta cetasikā vuccanti siyā ati ekaccā iti atthe nipāta

original: padaṃ. Imesu chasu cittuppādesu ekacce cha cittuppādā sotāpatti maggena pahātabbā,
analyzed: padam imesu chasu cittuppādesu ekacce cha cittuppādā sotāpatti maggena pahātabbā

original: ekacce cha cittuppādā tīhi upari maggehi pahātabbāti attho. Tattha pathamapade “ekacce
analyzed: ekacce cha cittuppādā tīhi upari maggehi pahātabbā ti attho tattha pathama pade ekacce

original: cha cittuppādā”ti kammapathapattakammasahajātā cha cittuppādā. Dutīya pade “ekacce
analyzed: cha cittuppādā ti kamma patha patta kamma sahajātā cha cittuppādā pade ekacce

original: cha cittuppādā”ti akammapatha pattā dhammikesu ṭhānesu assādanābhi nandādivasena
analyzed: cha cittuppādā ti a kammapatha pattā dhammikesu ṭhānesu assādana abhi nandā ādi vasena

original: pavattā cha cittuppādā. “Tatthā”ti dhammasaṅgahe. “Itaratthā”ti itaresu bhāvanāya
analyzed: pavattā cha cittuppādā tattha ati dhamma saṅgahe itarattha ati itaresu bhāvanāya

original: pahātabbesu. “Tassā”ti nānakkhaṇika kammapaccayassa. Pāḷipāṭhe. “Sahajātā”ti attano
analyzed: pahātabbesu tassa ti kamma paccayassa pāḷi pāṭhe sahajātā ati attanaḥ

original: paccayuppannehi sahajātā. “Nānakkhaṇikā”ti attano paccayuppannehi asahajātā atītakālabhūte
analyzed: paccaya uppannehi sahajātā nānakkhaṇikā ati attanaḥ paccaya uppannehi asahajātā atīta kāla bhūte

original: nānakkhaṇe pavattā pāṇātipātādi cetanā. “Yadi evaṃ”ti evaṃ yadi siyāti attho. Yadi
analyzed: nānā akkhaṇe pavattā pāṇa atipāta ādi cetanā yadi evam ti evam yadi siyā atthaḥ yadi

original: uddhacca cetanā dassana pade anuddhaṭattā paṭisandhiṃ nākaḍḍhatīti viññāyeyya. Evaṃ
analyzed: uddhacca cetanā dassana pade anuddhaṭattā paṭisandhim na ākaḍḍhati iti viññāyeyya evam

original: satīti pāṭhaseso. “Ce”ti ce vadeyya. “Nā”ti na sakkā vattuṃ. “Tassā vipākassā”ti
analyzed: ca iti ce vadeyya na ati na sakkā vattum tassā vipākassa ati

original: tassā uddhacca cetanāya vipākassa. Pāḷipāṭhe. “Imesu dhammesu ñāṇaṃ”ti ime dhamme
analyzed: tassā uddhacca cetanāya vipākassa pāḷipāṭhe imesu dhammesu ime dhamme

original: ārammaṇaṃ katvā uppannaññāṇaṃ. “Tesaṃ vipāke”ti uddhacca sahagatānaṃ vipāke. “Ñāṇaṃ”ti
analyzed: ārammaṇam katvā uppanna ññāṇam tesam vipāke iti uddhacca sahagatānam vipāke ñāṇam ti

original: taṃ vipākaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā uppannaññāṇaṃ. “Sabba dubbalanti ca sakkā vattuṃ”ti sambandho.
analyzed: tam vipākam ārammaṇam katvā uppanna ññāṇam ca sakkā vattum ti sambandho

original: “Ativiya kāḷakadhammattā”ti buddhādīsu mahantesu ṭhānesu saddhāratanassa antarāyaṃ
analyzed: buddha ādīsu mahantesu ṭhānesu saddhāratanassa antarāyam

original: katvā pavattanato atiyevakaṇha dhammattā. Tassā vicikicchā cetanāya paṭisandhi ākaḍḍhanampi
analyzed: katvā pavattanataḥ dhamma ttā tassā vicikicchā cetanāya paṭisandhi ākaḍḍhanam pi

original: viññātabbanti yojanā. “Sabhāva viruddhattā yevā”ti vicikicchā asanniṭṭhāna sabhāvā.
analyzed: viññātabbanti yojanā sabhāva viruddhattā yeva ati vicikicchā asanniṭṭhāna sabhāvā

original: Adhimokkho sanniṭṭhāna sabhāvoti evaṃ sabhāva viruddhattāyeva.
analyzed: adhimokkhaḥ sanniṭṭhāna sabhāvo ti evam sabhāva viruddha ttāya iva

original: “Sabbatthā”tiādīsu. “Vipaccatīti vipācetī”ti vadanti. Taṃ pana padarūpena na sametīti
analyzed: sabbattha atiādīsu vipaccati iti vipāca iti iti vadanti tam pana pada rūpena na sameti iti

original: aññaṃ atthaṃ vadanto “sabbampi vā”tiādimāha. “Mahāsampattiyo samuṭṭhāpetvā”ti devaloke
analyzed: aññam attham vadantaḥ sabbam pi vā tiādim āha mahā sampattiyaḥ samuṭṭhāpetvā iti deva loke

original: devasampatti sadisā dibbavimānādikā mahāsampattiyo samuṭṭhāpetvā. Idaṃ “okāsaṃ katvā”ti
analyzed: deva sampatti sadisāḥ dibba vimāna ādikāḥ mahā sampattiyaḥ samuṭṭhāpetvā idam okāsam katvā ati

original: pade visesanaṃ. Tattha “sukha vipākaṃ”ti idaṃ aṭṭha ahetuka vipākāni sandhāya vuttaṃ.
analyzed: pade visesanam tattha sukha vipākam ti idam aṭṭha ahetuka vipākāni sandhāya vuttaṃ

original: Rūpaloke brahmānaṃ rūpakāyo rūpāvacara kammena nibbatto. So ca kāmāvacara dhamma
analyzed: rūpa loke brahmānam rūpa kāyaḥ rūpāvacara kammena nibbatto so ca kāmāvacara dhamma

original: samūho eva. Evaṃ sante tasmiṃ loke pañca ahetuka vipākānipi rūpāvacara kammena nibbattāni
analyzed: samūho eva evam sante tasmin loke pañca ahetuka vipākānipi rūpāvacara kammena nibbattāni

original: siyunti codanā. Taṃ pariharanto “rūpāvacara kusalaṃhī”tiādimāha. “Tānī”ti apāyabhūmiyaṃ
analyzed: codanā tam pariharantaḥ tāni iti apāya bhūmi iyam

original: uppannāni aṭṭha ahetuka vipākāni. “Sabbasmiṃ kāmaloke”ti ekādasavidhe kāmaloke. “Tesu
analyzed: uppannāni aṭṭha ahetuka vipākāni sabbasmiṃ kāmaloke iti ekādasavidhe kāmaloke tesu

original: cā”ti tesu aṭṭha ahetuka vipākesu ca. “Ārammaṇantare”ti kasiṇa nimittādito aññasmiṃ
analyzed: ca ati tesu aṭṭha ahetuka vipākesu ca ārammaṇa antare ti kasiṇa nimittādito aññasmin

original: ārammaṇe. “Nimittā rammaṇe”ti kasiṇa nimittādike nimitta paññattā rammaṇe. “Tāni
analyzed: ārammaṇe nimittā ārammaṇā iti kasiṇa nimittādike nimitta paññattā ārammaṇe tāni

original: pañcavipākānī”ti cakkhu viññāṇādīni pañca ahetuka vipākāni kāmāvacara kusala kammasseva
analyzed: pañca vipākāni iti cakkhu viññāṇa ādīni pañca ahetuka vipākāni kāmāvacara kusala kammassa eva

original: vipākāni hontīti yojanā. “Soḷasaka maggo”ti soḷasakathā maggo kathāpabandho. Evaṃ
analyzed: vipākāni honti iti yojanā evam

original: dvādasa kamaggo. “Ahetukaṭṭhaka”nti ahetuka vipākaṭṭhakaṃ. Sammā pakārena jānātīti
analyzed: dvādasa ka maggaḥ ahetuka ṭṭhakanti ahetuka vipāka ṭṭhakam sammā pakārena jānāti iti

original: sampajānaṃ. Ñāṇaṃ. Sampajānena katanti viggaho. Na sampajānakataṃ asampajānakataṃ.
analyzed: sampajānam ñāṇam sampajānena katanti viggahaḥ na sampajāna katam a sampajāna katam

analyzed: saddahitvā iti etena diṭṭhuju kamma ñāṇa sampattim dīpeti na hi tena ñāṇena a sampannaḥ

analyzed: kammam ca kamma phalam ca saddahati iti jānitvā iti vā pāṭhaḥ siyā ekam ekam iti ekam ekam

original: kusalakammaṃ. “Kusala samaye”ti kusala kamma karaṇakāle. Kusaluppattikāle vā. Yassame
analyzed: kusala kammam kusala samaya iti kusala kamma karaṇa kāle kusala uppatti kāle vā yaḥ same

original: īdisaṃ puññaṃ pasutaṃ. Tassame bhavalābho bhogalābho mittalābho sabbelābhā ekantena

analyzed: su lābhā ti attho su laddham ti idam puññam su laddham devesu ca manussesu saṃsaritvā ati

original: pāṭhaseso. “Sesenā”ti tassakammassa vipākāvasesena. Aṭṭhakathā pāṭhe. “Ekapiṇḍapātasmiṃ”ti
analyzed: pāṭha sesaḥ sesena āti tassa kammassa vipāka avasesena aṭṭhakathā pāṭhe eka piṇḍapātasmin ti

original: ekameva paṭisandhiṃ detī’ti, taṃ suvuttanti adhippāyo. “Paṭipakkhehī”ti paṭipakkhehi
analyzed: ekam eva paṭisandhim deti iti tat su vuttam ti adhippāyaḥ paṭipakkhehi iti paṭipakkhehi

analyzed: paccaya bhūtanti viggahaḥ ati duppaññāya paccaya bhūtanti attho so hi theraḥ vadati iti

original: sambandho. “Iti katvā”ti evaṃ manasikaritvā. “Sannihitapaccayamattenā”ti āsanne saṇṭhitapaccaya
analyzed: sambandhaḥ iti katvā iti evam manasikaritvā sannihita paccaya mattena ati āsanne saṇṭhita paccaya

analyzed: mattena pubba payoga paccaya mattena ati vuttam hoti balava kamma vasena uppanna ttā

original: tikkhataraṃ vipākaṃ. Yadā payoga rahitena paccayagaṇena uppajjati, tadā asaṅkhārikaṃ
analyzed: tikkhataram vipākam yadā payoga rahitena paccaya gaṇena uppajjati tadā asaṅkhārikam

analyzed: nāma yadā payoga sahitena tadā sasaṅkhārikam nāma tattha asaṅkhārikam tikkham nāma

original: Sasaṅkhārikaṃ mandaṃ nāma. Tathā dubbala kammena uppanne mandavipākepi yojetabbaṃ.
analyzed: sa saṅkhārikam mandam nāma tathā dubbala kammena uppanne manda vipāke pi yojetabbam

analyzed: evam tikkha mandānam manda tikkha tā āpatti nāma siyā na ca tathā sakkā bhavitunti adhippāyaḥ

original: Ettha siyā, yadi pubbakammavasena aṭṭhannaṃ mahāvipākānaṃ saṅkhārabhedo siddho siyā,
analyzed: ettha siyā yadi pubba kamma vasena aṭṭhannam mahā vipākānam saṅkhāra bhedaḥ siddhaḥ siyā

analyzed: kammena nibbattāni kānici sa saṅkhārikena ati codanā tam pariharantaḥ ahetuka vipākānam

original: panā”tiādimāha. “Ubhayakamma nibbattanaṃ”ti tesaṃ saṅkhāra bhedarahitattā asaṅkhārika
analyzed: pana ati ādim āha ubhaya kamma nibbattanam ti tesam saṅkhāra bheda rahita ttā asaṅkhārika

original: kammenapi virodho natthi. Sasaṅkhārika kammenapi virodho natthi. Asaṅkhārika kammenapi
analyzed: kammena api virodhaḥ natthi sasaṅkhārika kammena api virodhaḥ natthi asaṅkhārika kammena api

original: “Iti adhippāyo”ti tassa therassa adhippāyo. “Na kammāgamana vasenā”ti kammasaṅkhātassa

analyzed: cirakālato āgamana paccayassa vasena āgamanaṃti ca āgacchati etena ati āgamananti

analyzed: viggahaḥ kamma bhave iti atīte kamma karaṇa bhave kecana ati keci aṭṭhasāliniyam pana

analyzed: paṭisambhidā maggaṭṭhakathā vacanam pi vattabbanti vadantaḥ tattha pana iti ādim āha

original: “Tīsukhaṇesū”ti kammakkhaṇe nikantikkhaṇe paṭisandhikkhaṇeti tīsukhaṇesu. “Ṭīkākārāpanā”ti
analyzed: tīsu khaṇesu iti kamma khaṇe nikanti khaṇe paṭisandhi khaṇe iti tīsu khaṇesu

analyzed: ti hetukena kammena dvi hetuka paṭisandhi

original: dvihetukena kammena ahetuka paṭisandhi avasesā hoti. Evaṃ avasesa vākya sahito pāṭho.
analyzed: dvihetukena kammena ahetuka paṭisandhi avasesā hoti evam avasesa vākya sahitaḥ pāṭhaḥ

original: Sarikkhameva sarikkhakaṃ. Kammena sarikkhakaṃ sadisaṃ kammasarikkhakaṃ. Vipākaṃ.
analyzed: sa rikkham eva sa rikkhakam kammena sa rikkhakam sadisam kamma sa rikkhakam vipākam

original: “Mahātherenā”ti sāriputta mahātherena. Evañca katvātiādinā ṭīkākārānaṃ vacanaṃ upatthambheti.

original: Kāmāvacarakammaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
analyzed: kāmāvacara kammam niṭṭhitam

original: 154. Rūpāvacarakamme. “Appaguṇatāyā”ti aparicitatāya. Avaḍḍhatāya. “Hīnehi chandādīhī”ti
analyzed: rūpāvacara kamme appaguṇa tāya ati a paricita tāya a vaḍḍha tāya hīnehi chanda ādīhi iti

analyzed: lābha sakkāra si loka ādi sāpekkha tāya hīnehi chanda ādīhi te dhammā ati chanda ādayaḥ dhammā

original: Tāni idha nādhippetāni. Kasmā, upapattippabhedassa asādhakattāti adhippāyo. “Imānevā”ti
analyzed: tāni idha na adhippetāni kasmai upapatti ppabhedassa asādhaka ttā ati adhippāyaḥ imān eva āti

original: imāni eva jhānāni. “Tividhāsū”ti ekasmiṃtale brahmapārisajjādi vasena tividhāsu.
analyzed: imāni eva jhānāni tividhāsu iti ekasmin tale brahmapārisajjā ādi vasena tividhāsu

original: “Aṭṭhārasappabhedena vibhajitvā”ti tīsu hīna majjhimapaṇītesu ekekasmiṃ hīna hīnaṃ

original: hīna majjhimaṃ hīna paṇītantiādinā vibhattena navavidhāni honti. Puna tesu tīṇi majjhimāni.
analyzed: hīna majjhimam hīna paṇīta nti ādinā vibhattena navavidhāni honti puna tesu tīṇi majjhimāni

original: Majjhimahīnaṃ majjhimamajjhimantiādinā vibhattāni navavidhāni honti. Evaṃ aṭṭhārasabhedena

original: vibhajitvā. “Kammadvārāni nāmā”ti kammappavatti mukhāni nāma. “Imehi pabhāvitattā”ti
analyzed: vibhajitvā kamma dvārāni nāma ati kamma ppavatti mukhāni nāma imehi pabhāvita ttā ti

original: imehi pabhāvehi mūlakāraṇehi pabhāvitattā pavattāpitattā. “Aṭṭhārasakhattiyā”ti hīnamajjhimādibhedena
analyzed: imehi pabhāvehi mūla kāraṇehi pabhāvita ttā pavattāpita ttā aṭṭhārasa khattiyā ati hīna majjhima ādi bhedena

original: aṭṭhārasa khattiyā. Tathā aṭṭhārasa brāhmaṇādayo. Aṭṭha cattālīsa gottāni nāma hīnamajjhimā
analyzed: aṭṭhārasa khattiyā tathā aṭṭhārasa brāhmaṇa ādayaḥ aṭṭha cattālīsa gottāni nāma hīna majjhimā

original: divasena vibhattāni gotamagottādīni aṭṭhacattālīsa gottāni. Tesaṃ cāritta paṭipattibhūtāni
analyzed: divasena vibhattāni gotama gotta ādīni gottāni tesam paṭipatti bhūtāni

original: caraṇānipi aṭṭhacattālīsa hontīti. Ettha siyā. Purima vacane hīnādīni brahmaloke,
analyzed: caraṇāni pi aṭṭhacattālīsa honti iti ettha siyā purima vacane hīna ādīni brahmaloke

original: aṭṭhakathā vacanehīnādīni manussaloketi sādhetabbaṃ aññaṃ, sādhakaṃ aññanti codanā.
analyzed: aṭṭhakathā manussa loke iti sādhetabbam aññam sādhakam aññanti codanā

original: Taṃ pariharati “etenahī”tiādinā. “Upalakkhetī”ti paccakkhato pākaṭaṃ ekadesaṃ dassetvā
analyzed: tam pariharati etena hi itiādinā upalakkheti iti paccakkhataḥ pākaṭam ekadesam dassetvā

original: apākaṭe tādisepi jānāpetīti attho. “Samatthā samatthaṃ vā”ti samatthā samatthabhāvaṃ
analyzed: apākaṭe tādise api jānāpeti iti samatthā samattham vāti samatthā samattha bhāvam

original: vā. “Tathā hānenā”ti tathāhi anena ācariyena. Anuruddhā cariyenāti vuttaṃ hoti. Nāma
analyzed: vā tathā ha anena ati tathā hi anena ācariyena anuruddhā cariyena ati vuttam hoti nāma

original: rūpa paricchede vuttanti sambandho. Samānāsevane laddhe sati, mahabbale vijjamāne

analyzed: na bhaveyya evam añña kāraṇa ttā asamānam nidassanam hoti na asamānā sevana tāya ati

analyzed: lokassa iva abhāvato ti

original: Kammacatukkānudīpanā niṭṭhitā.

analyzed: etā pakatiyā ati dubbaṇṇam attānam deva charāvaṇṇam katvā vañcenti

original: dibbavimānaṃ katvā vañcenti. Evarūpena vañcakaṭṭhena. “Tenevaṭṭhenā”ti visaṃvādakaṭṭhādinā
analyzed: dibba vimānam katvā vañcenti evarūpena vañcaka ṭṭhena teneva ṭṭhena ati visaṃvādaka ṭṭha ādinā

original: tividheneva atthena. Tānipihi asattabhūtaṃyeva attānaṃ sattoti visaṃvādenti. Arukkhaṃyeva
analyzed: tividhena iva atthena a satta bhūtam yā iva attānam satto ti visaṃvādenti a rukkham yā iva

original: attānaṃ rukkhoti visaṃvādenti. Aniṭṭhaṃ, akantaṃ, amanāpaṃyeva attānaṃ iṭṭho, kanto,
analyzed: attānam rukkho ti visaṃvādenti an iṭṭham a kantam a manāpam yeva attānam iṭṭhaḥ kantaḥ

original: manāpoti vañcenti, tathā sahajātānañca tesaṃ aññamaññassa anto vā tiṭṭhanti. Udāhubahivātiṭṭhantīti
analyzed: manāpo ti vañcenti tathā sahajātānam ca tesam aññam aññassa antar vā tiṭṭhanti udāhu bahi vā tiṭṭhanti iti

original: jānituṃ passituṃ asakkuṇeyyaṃ ṭhānaṃ hotīti. “Ubhayatthapī”ti māyākārādi mahābhūtesu
analyzed: jānitum passitum a sakkuṇeyyam ṭhānam hoti iti ubhayattha pi iti māyākāra ādi mahābhūtesu

original: ca pathaviyādimahābhūtesu ca. “Abhūtānī”ti asantāni, asaccāni.“Abbhutānī”ti acchariyakammāni.
analyzed: ca pathaviya ādi mahābhūtesu ca abhūtāni iti asantāni asaccāni abbhutāni iti acchariya kammāni

original: “Imasmiṃ pāṭhe”ti catunnaṃ mahābhūtānanti evaṃ sambandha padasahite pāṭhe. Aññattha
analyzed: imasmin pāṭha iti evam sambandha pada sahite pāṭhe aññattha

original: pana upādārūpaṃ anupādārūpantiādīsu yakāra viraho diṭṭhoti adhippāyo. Dhātūnaṃ anekatthattā
analyzed: pana upādārūpam anupādārūpam ti ādīsu yakāra virahaḥ diṭṭhaḥ ti adhippāyaḥ dhātūnam anekatthattā

original: “pathayati pakkhāyatī”ti vuttaṃ. “Puthū”ti pāṭipadikapadaṃ. Tameva jātatthe niruttinayena
analyzed: pathayati pakkhāyati iti vuttam puthu iti pāṭipadika padam tam eva jātatthe nirutti nayena

original: pathavīti siddhanti dassetuṃ “puthumahantī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Pakārena thavīyatīti atthe
analyzed: pathavī iti siddhanti dassetum puthu mahanti itiādi vuttam pakārena thavīyati iti atthe

original: pathavīti idaṃ ujukameva. “Āpetī”ti byāpeti. “Appāyatī”ti bhusaṃ pāyati, vaḍḍheti.
analyzed: pathavī iti idam ujukam eva āpeti iti byāpeti appāyati iti bhusam pāyati vaḍḍheti

original: Tenāha “suṭṭhu brūhetī”tiādiṃ. Nisānatthavaseneva paripācanatthopi labbhatīti āha
analyzed: tena āha suṭṭhu brūha iti itiādim nisāna attha vasena iva paripācana atthaḥ api labbhati iti āha

original: “paripācetivā”ti. “Samīretī”ti suṭṭhu īreti kampeti. Vāyati vahatīti vāyo atthātissaya
analyzed: samīreti iti suṭṭhu īreti kampeti vāyati vahati iti vāyo

original: nayena. “Vitthambhanaṃ”ti vividhena ākārena bhūtasaṅghāṭānaṃ thambhanaṃ vahanaṃ abhinīharaṇaṃ.
analyzed: nayena vitthambhanam ti vividhena ākārena bhūta saṅghāṭānam thambhanam vahanam abhinīharaṇam

original: Kakkhaḷatā nāma kharatā pharusatā. Sahajātarūpānaṃ patiṭṭhānatthāya thaddhatā thūlatā.
analyzed: kakkhaḷa tā nāma khara tā pharusa tā sahajāta rūpānam patiṭṭhāna tthāya thaddha tā thūla tā

original: Sā sesabhūtesu natthīti āha “sesabhūtattayaṃ upādāyā”ti. “Anavaṭṭhānatā”ti ettha
analyzed: sā sesa bhūtesu natthi iti āha sesa bhūta ttayam upādāya ati anavaṭṭhāna tā ati ettha

original: avaṭṭhānaṃ nāma acalaṭṭhānaṃ. Na avaṭṭhānanti anavaṭṭhānaṃ. Calananti vuttaṃ hoti.
analyzed: avaṭṭhānam nāma acala ṭhānam na avaṭṭhānanti anavaṭṭhānam calananti vuttam hoti

original: Tenāha “mudubhūtāpī”tiādiṃ. Ābandhakaṃ nāma ābandhitabbe vatthumhi mudumhi sati,
analyzed: tena āha mudu bhūtā api iti ādim ābandhakam nāma ābandhitabbe vatthumhi mudumhi sati

original: daḷhaṃ na bandhati. Thaddhesati, daḷhaṃ bandhatīti idaṃ lokatova siddhanti āha “ābandhitabbāyā”tiādiṃ.
analyzed: daḷham na bandhati daḷham bandhati iti idam siddham ti āha ābandhitabbāya ati ādim

original: “Tabbhāvaṃ”ti pariṇatabhāvaṃ. “Paripācakatā dassanato”ti hemante ajjhohaṭāhārānaṃ
analyzed: tad bhāvam ti pariṇata bhāvam paripācaka tā dassanataḥ ti hemante

original: suṭṭhuparipācakatā dassanatoti vadanti. Usati dahatīti uṇhaṃ. “Dahatī”ti ca uṇhatejopi
analyzed: suṭṭhu paripācaka tā dassanato ti vadanti usati dahati iti uṇham dahati iti ca uṇha tejaḥ pi

original: uṇhabhāvena dahati, sītatejopi sītabhāvena dahati. Uṇhena phuṭṭhaṃ vatthu uṇhattaṃ
analyzed: uṇha bhāvena dahati sīta tejaḥ api sīta bhāvena dahati uṇhena phuṭṭham vatthu uṇha ttam

original: gacchati, sītena phuṭṭhaṃ vatthu sītattaṃ gacchati. Yañca uṇhattaṃ gacchati, taṃ
analyzed: gacchati sītena phuṭṭham vatthu sītattam gacchati yat ca uṇhattam gacchati tam

original: uṇhatejo uṇhabhāvena dahatināma. Yañca sītattaṃ gacchati, taṃ sītatejo sītabhāvena
analyzed: uṇha tejaḥ uṇha bhāvena dahati nāma yat ca sītat tam gacchati tam sīta tejaḥ sīta bhāvena

original: dahatināma. Evaṃ sītatejopi usatidahatīti atthena uṇhatta lakkhaṇonāma hotīti. Evaṃsante
analyzed: dahati nāma evam sīta tejaḥ pi usati dahati iti atthena hoti iti evaṃsante

original: nīlenavaṇṇena phuṭṭhaṃ vatthu nīlaṃ hoti. Pītena phuṭṭhaṃ pītaṃ hoti. Nīlaṃpi pītaṃpi
analyzed: nīlena vaṇṇena phuṭṭham vatthu nīlam hoti pītena phuṭṭham pītam hoti nīlam pi pītam pi

original: taṃ vatthuṃ dahatināmāti ce. Nīlena vaṇṇena phuṭṭhaṃnāma natthi. Tathā pītena. Kasmā,
analyzed: tam vatthum dahati nāma ati ce nīlena vaṇṇena phuṭṭham nāma natthi tathā pītena kasmā

original: nīlādīnaṃ upādārūpānaṃ phusana kiccā bhāvato. Sammissitaṃ nāma hoti. Na ca sammissanamattena
analyzed: nīla ādīnam bhāvataḥ sammissitam nāma hoti na ca sammissana mattena

original: dahati. Phusanto eva dahati. Phusantānaṃpi pathavivātānaṃ dahanakiccaṃ natthi. Paripācanakiccaṃ
analyzed: dahati phusantaḥ eva dahati phusantānam pi pathavi vātānam dahana kiccam na atthi paripācana kiccam

original: natthīti adhippāyo. Sace ghanathaddhe silāthambhe vitthambhanaṃ atthi, sakalo silāthambho
analyzed: natthi iti adhippāyaḥ sace ghana thaddhe silā thambhe vitthambhanam atthi sakalaḥ silā thambho

original: kappāsapicuguḷhoviya sithilo ca lahuko ca bhaveyya. Naca bhavati. Tasmā tattha vitthambhanaṃ
analyzed: sithilo ca lahuko ca bhaveyya na ca bhavati tasmā vitthambhanaṃ

original: natthīti adhippāyena “so pana ghanathaddhesu silāthambhādīsu na labbhatī”ti codeti.
analyzed: natthi iti adhippāyena so pana ghana thaddhesu silā thambha ādīsu na labbhati iti codeti

original: Tattha pana vitthambhanaṃ labbhamānaṃ adhimattena na labbhati, sahajātabhūtānaṃ upatthambhanamattena
analyzed: tattha pana vitthambhanam labbhamānam adhimattena na labbhati sahajāta bhūtānam upatthambhana mattena

original: labbhatīti dassento “nā”ti vatvā “tatthahī”tiādimāha. Tattha “vahatī”ti thaddhakakkhaḷa kiccaṃ vahati.
analyzed: labbhati iti dassentaḥ na ati vatvā tatthahi itiādim āha tattha vahati iti kiccam vahati

original: Pasādarūpesu. “Samavisamaṃ”ti samaṭṭhānañca visamaṭṭhānañca, samadesañca visamadesañca,
analyzed: pasāda rūpesu sama visamanti sama ṭṭhānañca visama ṭṭhānañca sama desañca visama desañca

original: samapathañca visamapathañcāti evamādiṃ samavisamaṃ. “Ācikkhatī”ti ācikkhantaṃ viya
analyzed: sama patham ca visama patham ca ati evamādim sama visamam ācikkhati iti ācikkhantam viya

original: taṃ jānana kiccaṃ sampādeti. Tenāha “samavisamajānanassa taṃ mūlakattā”ti. “Anirākaraṇato”ti
analyzed: tam jānana kiccam sampādeti tena āha sama visama jānanassa tam mūlakattā ati a nirākaraṇato ti

original: appaṭikkhipanato. “Taṃ vā”ti rūpaṃ vā. Suṇanti janā. Suyyanti janehi. Evaṃ ghāyantītiādīsu.
analyzed: a paṭikkhipanato tam vā ati rūpam vā suṇanti janā janehi evam gha āyanti iti ādīsu

original: “Jīvita nimittaṃ”ti jīvitappavattikāraṇabhūto. “Ninnatāyā”ti visayavisayībhāvūpagamanena
analyzed: nimittam ti jīvita ppavatti kāraṇa bhūtaḥ ninna tāya ati visaya visayībhāva upagamanena

original: ninnatāya. “Jīvitavutti sampādakattā”ti nānāvacībhedavacīkammappavattanenāti adhippāyo.
analyzed: ninna tāya sampādaka ttā ati nānā vacī bheda vacī kamma ppavattanena ati adhippāyaḥ

original: Ime pana pañca cakkhu pasādādayoti sambandho. “Daṭṭhukāmatā”ti rūpataṇhā vuccati.
analyzed: ime pana pañca cakkhu pasāda ādayo ti sambandho daṭṭhu kāma tā ati rūpa taṇhā vuccati

original: Ādisaddena sotukāmatā ghāyitukāmatā sāyitukāmatā phusitukāmatāyo saṅgayhanti. Atthato
analyzed: ādi saddena sotu kāma tā ghāyitu kāma tā sāyitu kāma tā phusitu kāma tāyo saṅgayhanti atthato

original: saddataṇhā gandhataṇhā rasataṇhā phoṭṭhabbataṇhā eva. “Nidānaṃ”ti kāraṇaṃ. Daṭṭhukāmatādayo
analyzed: sadda taṇhā gandha taṇhā rasa taṇhā phoṭṭhabba taṇhā eva nidānam ti kāraṇam daṭṭhu kāma tā ādayaḥ

original: nidāna massāti viggaho. Kusalā kusalakammaṃ. Samuṭṭhāti etenāti samuṭṭhānaṃ. Kammameva.
analyzed: nidāna massa ati viggahaḥ kusalā kusala kammam samuṭṭhāti etena ati samuṭṭhānam kammam eva

original: Daṭṭhukāmatādinidānakammaṃ samuṭṭhānaṃ yesanti samāso. Pathaviādīni bhūtāni. Tesaṃ
analyzed: daṭṭhu kāma tā ādi nidāna kammam samuṭṭhānam yesanti samāsaḥ pathavi ādīni bhūtāni tesam

original: pasādo lakkhaṇaṃ etesanti viggaho. Dutīya vikappe. Rūpādīnaṃ pañcārammaṇānaṃ abhighātaṃ
analyzed: pasādaḥ lakkhaṇam etesan ti viggahaḥ dutīya vikappe rūpa ādīnam pañca ārammaṇānam abhighātam

original: arahatīti rūpādiabhighātāraho. Bhūtānaṃ pasādo bhūtappasādo. So lakkhaṇaṃ etesanti
analyzed: arahati iti rūpa ādi abhighāta arahaḥ bhūtānam pasādaḥ bhūta ppasādo so lakkhaṇam etesan ti

original: viggaho. Cakkhu ūkāsirappamāṇe diṭṭha maṇḍale tiṭṭhatīti sambandho. “Diṭṭhamaṇḍale”ti
analyzed: viggahaḥ cakkhu diṭṭha maṇḍale tiṭṭhati iti sambandhaḥ diṭṭha maṇḍala iti

original: mahājanehi pakati cakkhunā diṭṭhe pasannamaṇḍale. Telaṃ sattapicupaṭalāni byāpetvā
analyzed: mahājanehi pakati cakkhunā diṭṭhe pasanna maṇḍale telam satta picu paṭalāni byāpetvā

original: tiṭṭhativiyāti yojanā. “Sotabilaṃ” nāma sotakūpo. “Aṅguliveṭhanā” nāma aṅgulimuddikā.
analyzed: yojanā sotabilam nāma sotakūpaḥ aṅguliveṭhanā nāma aṅgulimuddikā

original: “Upacitatanutambalomaṃ”ti rāsīkatañca viraḷañca tambalohavaṇṇañca sukhumalomaṃ. Upacitaṃ
analyzed: upacita tanu tamba lomanti rāsīkatam ca viraḷam ca tamba loha vaṇṇam ca sukhuma lomam upacitam

original: rāsīkataṃ tanutambalomaṃ etthāti viggaho. “Ajapadasaṇṭhānaṃ”ti ajassa pādena akkantapadasaṇṭhānavantaṃ.
analyzed: rāsīkatam tanu tamba lomam ettha iti viggahaḥ aja pada saṇṭhānam ti ajassa pādena akkanta pada saṇṭhānavantam

original: “Uppaladalaṃ” nāma uppalapaṇṇaṃ. Uppaladalassa aggasaṇṭhānavantaṃ. “Vaṭṭi” nāma idha
analyzed: uppaladalam nāma uppala paṇṇam uppaladalassa agga saṇṭhānavantam vaṭṭi nāma idha

original: manussānaṃ sarīrākārasaṇṭhitā āyatapiṇḍi. “Sukkhacammāni ca ṭhapetvā”ti sambandho.
analyzed: manussānam sarīra ākāra saṇṭhitā āyata piṇḍi sukkha cammāni ca ṭhapetvā iti sambandho

original: Te pana pañcappasādā. Samudīraṇaṃ cañcalanaṃ. “Yathātaṃ”ti katamaṃ viya taṃ. Ime
analyzed: te pana pañca ppasādā samudīraṇam cañcalanam katamam ime

original: pasādā vicittā, kathaṃvicittāti āha “aññamaññaṃ asadisā”ti. Kathaṃ asadisāti āha “tehī”tiādiṃ.
analyzed: pasādā vicittā katham vicittā iti āha aññam aññam asadisā ati katham asadisā ati āha tehi itiādim

original: Gocararūpesu. “Vaṇṇavisesaṃ”ti vaṇṇavisesatthaṃ. Vaṇṇavikāranti vuttaṃ hoti. Hadaye
analyzed: gocara rūpesu vaṇṇa visesam ti vaṇṇa visesa attham vaṇṇa vikāram ti vuttam hoti hadaye

original: gato pavatto bhāvo hadayaṅgatabhāvo. “Bhāvo”ti ca adhippāyo vuccati. Taṃ pakāseti,
analyzed: gataḥ pavattaḥ bhāvaḥ hadayaṅgata bhāvaḥ bhāvaḥ iti ca adhippāyaḥ vuccati tam pakāseti

original: mukhe vaṇṇavikāraṃ disvā ayaṃ me tussati, ayaṃ me ruccati, ayaṃ me kuppati, ayaṃ
analyzed: mukhe vaṇṇa vikāram disvā ayam me tussati ayam me ruccati ayam me kuppati ayam

original: somanassito, ayaṃ domanassitoti evaṃ jānanapaccayattā. “Pakatiyā pī”ti vaṇṇavisesaṃ
analyzed: somanassitaḥ ayam domanassitaḥ ti evam jānana paccaya ttā pakatiyā pi iti vaṇṇa visesam

original: anāpajjitvāpīti adhippāyo. “Yaṃ kiñcidabbaṃ”ti saviññāṇakavatthuṃ. Samavisamaṃ pubbe
analyzed: an āpajjitvā api iti adhippāyaḥ yam sa viññāṇaka vatthum sama visamam pubbe

original: pakāsitaṃ. Taṃ taṃ atthaṃ vā ācikkhati taṃ sutvā tassa tassa atthassa jānanato. Attano
analyzed: pakāsitam tam tam attham vai ācikkhati tam sutvā tassa tassa atthassa jānanataḥ attano

original: vatthuṃ vā ācikkhati taṃ sutvā tassa vatthussapi jānanato. “Attano vatthuṃ sūcetī”ti
analyzed: vatthum vai ācikkhati tam sutvā tassa vatthussa api jānanataḥ attanaḥ vatthum sūceti iti

original: idha idaṃ nāma atthīti pakāseti. “Phusīyatī”ti phusitvā vijānīyati. “Taṃ”ti phusanaṃ.
analyzed: idha idam nāma atthi iti pakāseti phusīyati iti phusitvā vijānīyati taṃti phusanam

original: “Tassā”ti āpodhātuyā. “Dravatāvā”ti addatintarasatāvā. Phusitvā gayhati, sā ca āpodhātu
analyzed: tassa ati āpodhātuyā drava tāvā ati phusitvā gayhati sā ca āpodhātu

original: siyāti codeti. Vuccate parihāro. Evaṃ pana na labbhati, tasmā sā tejoyeva. Na āpoti.
analyzed: siyā iti codā iti vuccate parihāraḥ evam pana na labbhati tasmā sā tejoyā iva na āpo ti

original: Ettha evaṃ alabbhamānāpi sāsītatā āpoyeva, na tejo. Kasmā, āpassapi sītuṇhavasena
analyzed: ettha evam alabbhamānā api sā asītatā na tejaḥ kasmai āpassa api sītuṇha vasena

original: duvidhatā sambhavato. Tasmiñhi loharase uṇhatā uṇhaāpo, sītavatthūsu sītatā sītaāpoti
analyzed: duvidha tā tasmin hi loha rase sīta vatthūsu sīta tā

original: ce. Evaṃ pana sati tejo nāma natthīti āpajjatīti parihāro. “Saha appavattanato”ti
analyzed: ce evam pana sati tejaḥ nāma natthi iti āpajjati iti parihāraḥ saha a pavattanato ti

original: ekato appavattanato. “Orapārānaṃ viyā”ti nadiyaṃ tīraṃ nāma idaṃ orimatīraṃ, idaṃ
analyzed: ekatas appavattanataḥ viyāti nadiyam tīram nāma idam orima tīram idam

original: pārimanti niyamato natthi. Yattha sayaṃ tiṭṭhati, taṃ orimanti, itaraṃ pārimanti
analyzed: pārimanti niyamataḥ natthi yattha sayam tiṭṭhati tam orimanti itaram pārimanti

original: voharati. Evaṃ orapārānaṃ anavaṭṭhānaṃ hotīti. Ettha ca “sītuṇhānaṃ saha appavattanato”ti
analyzed: voharati evam anavaṭṭhānam hoti iti ettha ca sītuṇhānam saha a pavattanato ti

original: etena yadi te saha pavatteyyuṃ. Tattha sītatā āponāma, uṇhatā tejonāmāti vattabbā
analyzed: etena yadi te saha pavatteyyum tattha sīta tā āpaḥ nāma uṇha tā tejaḥ nāma ati vattabbā

original: siyuṃ. Na pana te saha pavattanti, tasmā tathā na vattabbā hontīti dasseti. Na na
analyzed: siyum na pana te saha pavattanti tasmā tathā na vattabbāḥ honti iti dasseti na na

original: vattabbā. Kasmā, uṇhatejena yuttohi āpo uṇhattameva gacchati. Yathātaṃ uṇhatejena
analyzed: vattabbā kasmai uṇha tejena yuttaḥ hi āpaḥ uṇha ttam eva gacchati yathā atam uṇha tejena

original: yuttā pathavīpi vāyopi uṇhattameva gacchantīti. Tasmā te saha na pavattanti. Saha
analyzed: yuttā pathavīpi vāyopi uṇhattam eva gacchanti iti tasmāt te saha na pavattanti saha

original: appavattesupi tesu aññattha sītavatthūsu sītatā āponāmāti vattabbameva hotīti codanā.
analyzed: appavattesu pi tesu aññattha sīta vatthūsu sīta tā āponāmā ati vattabbam eva hoti iti codanā

original: Evaṃsante tasmiṃ loharase sabbepi rūpadhammā uṇhattaṃ gacchantīti sabbepi tejobhāvaṃ
analyzed: evaṃsante tasmin loha rase sabbe api rūpa dhammāḥ uṇhattam gacchanti iti sabbe api tejaḥ bhāvam

original: pāpuṇanti. ‘Uṇhatta lakkhaṇo tejo’tihi vuttaṃ. Yadi ca sītavatthūsu sītabhāvo nāma
analyzed: pāpuṇanti vuttam yadi ca sīta vatthūsu sīta bhāvaḥ nāma

original: siyā. Tatthapi tena yuttā sabbepi rūpadhammā sītataṃ gacchantiyeva. Tatthapi tavamatiyā
analyzed: siyā tattha api tena yuttā sabbe pi rūpa dhammā sītatam gacchantiyā iva tattha api tava matiyā

original: sabbepi āpobhāvaṃ pāpuṇanti. Na pana sakkā tathā bhavituṃ. Na hi evarūpaṃ lakkhaṇaññathattaṃ
analyzed: sabbe api āpaḥ bhāvam pāpuṇanti na pana sakkā tathā bhavitum na hi evarūpam lakkhaṇa aññathattam

original: nāma tesaṃ atthi. Bhāvaññathattameva atthi. Tattha “lakkhaṇaññathattaṃ” nāma pathavī

original: āpobhāvaṃ gacchati. Āpo pathavibhāvaṃ gacchatītiādi. “Bhāvaññathattaṃ” nāma pathavī

original: kadāci kakkhaḷā hoti. Kadāci mudukā. Āpo kadāci ābandhanamatto hoti. Kadāci paggharaṇako.
analyzed: kadāci kakkhaḷā hoti kadāci mudukāḥ āpaḥ kadāci ābandhana mattaḥ hoti kadāci paggharaṇakaḥ

original: Tejo kadāci uṇho, kadāci sīto. Vāyo kadāci vitthambhanamatto, kadāci samudīraṇoti.
analyzed: kadāci uṇhaḥ kadāci sītaḥ vāyo kadāci kadāci

original: Evaṃ ekamekassā dhātuyā tikkha manda omattādhimattavasena kriyāsaṅkanti nāma atthīti.
analyzed: evam ekam ekassā dhātuyā nāma atthi iti

original: Tasmā yaṃ vuttaṃ ‘uṇhatejena yuttohi āpo uṇhattameva gacchati, yathā taṃ uṇhatejena

original: Na yujjati. Na hi uṇhatejena yuttā sabbetedhammā uṇhattaṃ gacchanti. Attano attano
analyzed: na yujjati na hi uṇha tejena yuttā sabbe te dhammā uṇha ttam gacchanti attanaḥ attanaḥ

original: sabhāvaṃ na vijahanti. Tathāhi tasmiṃ pakkuthite santatte loharase bhāvo uṇhattaṃ
analyzed: sabhāvam na vijahanti tathā hi tasmin pakkuthite santatte loha rase bhāvaḥ

original: na gacchati. Ābandhana sabhāvaṃ vā paggharaṇa sabhāvaṃ vā na vijahati. Yadi uṇhattaṃ
analyzed: na gacchati ābandhana sabhāvam vā paggharaṇa sabhāvam vā na vijahati yadi uṇhattam

original: vā na paññāyeyya. Sabberūpa dhammā vikkireyyuṃ. Vikkiritvā antaradhāreyyuṃ. Na ca

original: dassetī”ti. Taṃ suvuttamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. “Tesaṃ anavaṭṭhānato”ti etena sace te sītuṇhā

analyzed: na pana te avaṭṭhitāḥ honti anavaṭṭhitāḥ eva honti tasmā tathā na vattabbāḥ honti iti

analyzed: dassa iti ettha ca an avaṭṭhitesu santesu yadi sīta tā āpaḥ nāma uṇha tā tejaḥ nāma ati vadeyyuṃ

analyzed: evam ca sati āpa tejā api an avaṭṭhitā siyum idāni tejaḥ nāma

original: viya tesaṃ anavaṭṭhānato ca viññāyatī”ti. Tattha “viññāyatī”ti sāsītatā tejoyeva,

original: na āpoti viññāyatīti.
analyzed: na āpo ti viññāyati iti

original: “Atha panā”tiādīsu. Yaṃ pubbe parena vuttaṃ ‘nanu dravatā vā phusitvā gayhatī’ti.

analyzed: na sakkā hoti tathā idam imassa pana dūre pavattassa api gahaṇa yogya ttā ati ñāṇena

original: pariggahaṇapattattāti adhippāyo. Vibhāvanipāṭhe. “Sayaṃnissayavasena cā”ti sayañca
analyzed: pariggahaṇa patta ttā ti adhippāyaḥ vibhāvani pāṭhe sayam nissaya vasena ca ati sayam ca

original: nissaya mahābhūtavasena ca. Tattha sayaṃ sampattā nāma phoṭṭhabbadhātuyo. Nissayavasena
analyzed: nissaya mahābhūta vasena ca tattha sayam sampattāḥ nāma phoṭṭhabba dhātuyaḥ nissaya vasena

original: sampattā nāma gandharasā. Ubhayathāpi asampattā nāma cakkhu rūpa, sota saddā. Yo
analyzed: sampattāḥ nāma gandha rasāḥ ubhayathā api asampattāḥ nāma cakkhu rūpa sota saddā

original: paṭimukhabhāvo atthi, yaṃ aññamaññapatanaṃ atthīti yojanā. Na ca tāni aññappakārāni
analyzed: paṭimukha bhāvaḥ atthi yam aññamañña patanam atthi iti yojanā na ca tāni aññappakārāni

original: eva sakkā bhavitunti sambandho. “Anuggaha upaghātavasenā”ti vaḍḍhanatthāya anuggahavasena,
analyzed: eva sakkā bhavitum ti sambandhaḥ anuggahaḥ upaghāta vasena ati vaḍḍhana tthāya anuggaha vasena

original: hāyanādi atthāya upaghātavasena. “Yaṃ kiñcī”ti catusamuṭṭhānikarūpaṃ gaṇhāti. “Ādinnaparāmaṭṭhattā”ti
analyzed: hāyana ādi atthāya upaghāta vasena yam kiñci iti catu samuṭṭhānika rūpam gaṇhāti ādinna parāmaṭṭha ttā ati

original: taṇhāmānehi etaṃ mama esohamasmītiādinnattā, diṭṭhiyā eso me attāti parāmaṭṭhattā
analyzed: etam mama etam mama esaḥ aham asmi iti ādinna ttā diṭṭhiyā esaḥ me attā ati parāmaṭṭha ttā

original: ca. “Niccakālaṃ pavattivasenā”ti ekena janakakammena paṭisandhikkhaṇato paṭṭhāya
analyzed: ca nicca kālam pavatti vasena ati ekena janaka kammena paṭisandhi khaṇataḥ paṭṭhāya

original: niccakālaṃ pavattivasena. “Upacarīyatī”ti voharīyati. “Atthavisesabodho”ti rūpārammaṇassa
analyzed: nicca kālam pavatti vasena attha visesa bodho ti rūpa ārammaṇassa

original: kiccavisesabodho. “Asampattavasenā”ti visayaṭṭhānaṃ sayaṃ asampajjanavasena. Attanoṭhānaṃ
analyzed: kicca visesa bodhaḥ asampatta vasena āti visaya ṭṭhānam sayam asampajjana vasena attanoṭhānam

original: vā visayassa asampajjanavasena. Tattha visayassa asampattaṃ dassento “tatthā”tiādimāha.
analyzed: vā visayassa asampajjana vasena tattha visayassa asampattam dassento tattha ati ādim āha

original: Tathā sotasaddesu ca aññamaññaṃ laggitvā uppajjamānesu. “Sampattiyā evā”ti sampajjanatthāya
analyzed: tathā sota saddesu ca aññamaññam laggitvā uppajjamānesu sampattiyai eva ati sampajjana tthāya

original: eva. Tathā āpo ca sampattiyā eva paccayoti yojanā. Dubbalapathavī eva sannissayo
analyzed: eva tathā āpaḥ ca sampattiyāḥ eva paccayo ti yojanā dubbala pathavī eva sannissayo

original: yassāti viggaho. “Assā”ti cakkhussa. “Sotassapanakathaṃ”ti sotassa asampattaggahaṇaṃ
analyzed: yassa iti viggahaḥ assa ati cakkhussa sota sapana katham ti sotassa a sampatta gahaṇam

original: kathaṃ pākaṭaṃ. Sampattaggahaṇaṃ eva pākaṭanti dīpeti. Tenāha “tatthahī”tiādiṃ. Dakkhiṇapassato
analyzed: katham pākaṭam sampatta ggahaṇam eva pākaṭam ti dīpeti tena āha tattha hi itiādim dakkhiṇa passataḥ

original: vā suyyati, cetiyādikassa puratthimadisābhāge ṭhitānanti adhippāyo. “Paṭighaṭṭanānighaṃso”ti
analyzed: vā cetiya ādikassa puratthima disā bhāge adhippāyo paṭighaṭṭana anighaṃsaḥ ti

original: sotesu paṭighaṭṭanavego. “Tesaṃ”ti āsannevā dūre vā ṭhitānaṃ. Hotu dūre ṭhitānaṃ
analyzed: sotesu paṭighaṭṭana vegaḥ dūre vā hotu dūre

original: cirena sutoti abhimāno. Kasmā pana ujukaṃ asutvā dakkhiṇapassatovā uttarapassato
analyzed: cirena sutoti abhimāno kasmā pana ujukam a sutvā dakkhiṇa passato vā uttara passato

original: vā suṇeyya, asuyyamāno bhaveyyāti pucchā. Taṃ kathento “apicā”tiādimāha. Vibhāvanipāṭhe.
analyzed: vā suṇeyya a suyyamānaḥ bhaveyya iti pucchā tam kathentaḥ apica ati ādim āha vibhāvani pāṭhe

original: “Gantvā visayadesaṃ taṃ, pharitvā gaṇhatīti ce”ti taṃ cakkhusota dvayaṃ dūrevisayānaṃ
analyzed: gantvā visaya desam tam pharitvā gaṇhati iti ca iti tam cakkhusā uta dvayam

original: uppannadesaṃ pharitvā gaṇhatīti cevadeyyāti attho. Dūreṭhatvā passanto suṇanto ca
analyzed: uppanna desam pharitvā gaṇhati iti atthaḥ dūra iṭha tvā passanto suṇanto ca

original: mahantampipabbataṃ ekakkhaṇe passati, mahantaṃpi meghasaddaṃ ekakkhaṇe suṇāti. Tasmā
analyzed: mahantam pi pabbatam eka kkhaṇe passati mahantam pi megha saddam eka kkhaṇe suṇāti tasmā

original: ubhayaṃ asampattagocaranti viññāyati. Imasmiṃ vacane ṭhatvā idaṃ parikappavacanaṃ
analyzed: ubhayam a sampatta gocaran ti viññāyati imasmim vacane idam parikappa vacanam

original: dasseti taṃ dvayaṃ visayappadesaṃ gantvā mahantaṃpi pabbataṃ vā meghasaddaṃ vā pharitvā
analyzed: dassa iti tam dvayam visaya ppadesam gantvā mahantam pi pabbatam vā megha saddam vā pharitvā

original: gaṇhāti. Tasmā mahantaṃpi passati, suṇāti. Na asampattagocarattā mahantaṃ passati
analyzed: gaṇhāti tasmai mahantam pi passati suṇāti na a sampatta gocara ttā mahantam passati

original: suṇātīti koci vadeyyāti vuttaṃ hoti. Adhiṭṭhānavidhānepi tassa so gocaro siyāti.
analyzed: suṇāti iti koci vadeyya iti vuttam hoti adhiṭṭhāna vidhāne pi tassa so gocaro siyāti

original: Evaṃsati, dibbacakkhu dibbasotābhiññānaṃ adhiṭṭhānavidhānepi so rūpasaddavisayo tassa
analyzed: evaṃsati dibba cakkhu dibba sota abhiññānam adhiṭṭhāna vidhāne pi so rūpa sadda visayo tassa

original: pasādacakkhusotassa gocaro siyāti abhiññādhiṭṭhāna kiccaṃ nāma natthi. Cakkhusotaṃ
analyzed: pasāda cakkhu sotassa gocaro siyāti abhiññā adhiṭṭhāna kiccam nāma natthi cakkhu sotam

original: devalokampi gantvā dibbarūpampi dibbasaddampi gaṇheyya. Na pana gaṇhāti. Tasmā tassa
analyzed: deva lokam pi gantvā dibba rūpam pi dibba saddam pi gaṇheyya na pana gaṇhāti tasmā tassa

original: visayadesagamanañca mahantadesapharaṇañca na cintetabbanti vuttaṃ hoti.
analyzed: visaya desa gamanam ca mahanta desa pharaṇam ca na cintetabbanti vuttam hoti

original: Rūpavibhāgānudīpanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: rūpa vibhāga anudīpanā niṭṭhitā

original: 158. Rūpasamuṭṭhāne. Suttantesu cetanāsampayuttā abhijjhādayopi kammanti vuttā. Te
analyzed: rūpa samuṭṭhāne suttantesu cetanā sampayuttāḥ abhijjhā ādayaḥ api kammanti vuttā te

original: pana paṭṭhāne kammapaccayaṃ patvā tappaccayakiccaṃ na sādhenti, cetanā eva sādhetīti
analyzed: pana paṭṭhāne kamma paccayam patvā tad paccaya kiccam na sādhenti cetanāḥ eva sādheti iti

original: āha “sā yevā”tiādiṃ. “Taṃ samuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ”ti hetūhi ca hetusampayuttakadhammehi
analyzed: āha sā yā iva ati ādim tam hetūhi ca hetu sampayuttaka dhammehi

original: ca samuṭṭhānānañca rūpānanti atthavasena cetasikadhammānampi rūpasamuṭṭhāpakatā siddhā
analyzed: ca samuṭṭhānānam ca rūpānan ti attha vasena cetasika dhammānam pi rūpa samuṭṭhāpaka tā siddhā

original: hoti. So hi udayati pasavatīti sambandho. “Kappasaṇṭhāpanavasenā”ti kappappatiṭṭhāpanavasena.
analyzed: hoti saḥ hi udayati pasavati iti sambandho kappa saṇṭhāpana vasena ati kappa patiṭṭhāpana vasena

original: Ajjhattikasaddo chasu cakkhādīsu ajjhattikāyatane sveva pavattati. Idha pana sakalaṃ
analyzed: ajjhattika saddo chasu cakkha ādīsu ajjhattika āyatane su eva pavattati idha pana sakalam

original: ajjhattasantānaṃ adhippetanti āha “ajjhatta santāneti pana vattabbaṃ”ti. “Khaṇe khaṇe”ti
analyzed: ajjhatta santānam adhippetanti āha ajjhatta santāne iti pana vattabbam ti khaṇe khaṇe ti

original: vicchāvacanaṃ. “Vicchā”ti ca bahūsukhaṇesu byāpananti āha “tīsutīsukhaṇesū”ti.
analyzed: vicchā vacanam ca āha tīsu tīsu khaṇesu iti

original: Yamakapāṭhesu. Yassa vā pana puggalassa. “Nirujjhatī”ti bhaṅgakkhaṇa samaṅgitamāha.
analyzed: yamaka pāṭhesu yassa vā pana puggalassa nirujjhati iti bhaṅga kkhaṇa samaṅgitam āha

original: “Uppajjatī”ti uppādakkhaṇa samaṅgitaṃ. “Itī”ti ayaṃ pucchā. “No”ti paṭikkhepo. Samudayasaccassa
analyzed: uppajjati iti uppāda khaṇa iti iti ayam pucchā no ti paṭikkhepaḥ samudaya saccassa

original: bhaṅgakkhaṇe dukkhasaccabhūtassa rūpassavā nāmassavā uppādo nāma natthīti vuttaṃ
analyzed: bhaṅga kkhaṇe dukkha sacca bhūtassa rūpa ssavā nāma ssavā uppādo nāma natthi iti vuttam

original: hoti. Yassa kusalā dhammā uppajjanti, yassa akusalā dhammā uppajjantīti dve pāṭhāgahetabbā.
analyzed: hoti yassa kusalāḥ dhammāḥ uppajjanti yassa akusalāḥ dhammāḥ uppajjanti iti dve pāṭhā gahetabbā

original: “No”ti kusalākusala dhammānaṃ uppādakkhaṇe abyākatabhūtānaṃ rūpānaṃ vā nāmānaṃ vā
analyzed: dhammānaṃ uppāda kkhaṇe abyākata bhūtānam rūpānam vā nāmānam vā

original: nirodho nāma natthīti vuttaṃ hoti. Tesupāṭhesu kesañcivādīnaṃ vacanokāsaṃ dassetuṃ
analyzed: nirodho nāma natthi iti vuttam hoti tesu pāṭhesu kesañciva ādīnam vacana ukāsam dassetuṃ

original: “arūpabhavaṃ”tiādi vuttaṃ. “Ce”ti kocivādī cevadeyya. “Nā”ti na vattabbaṃ. “Uppajjatī”ti
analyzed: arūpa bhavan tiādi vuttam ca iti koci vādī na ati na vattabbam uppajjati iti

original: ca uddhaṭā siyunti sambandho. “Itarattha cā”ti tato itarasmiṃ yassa kusalā dhammātiādipāṭhe
analyzed: ca uddhaṭā siyunti sambandhaḥ itarattha ca ati tatas itarasmin yassa kusalā dhammā ati ādi pāṭhe

original: ca. “Tampi nā”ti tampi vacanaṃ na vattabbanti attho. “Purimakoṭṭhāse”ti asaññasattānaṃ
analyzed: ca tam pi na ati tam pi vacanam na vattabbanti attho purima koṭṭhāse iti asaññasattānam

original: tesaṃ tatthāti imasmiṃ purimapakkheti adhippāyo. “Pacchimakoṭṭhāse”ti sabbesaṃ cavantānaṃ
analyzed: tesam tattha āti imasmin purima pakkhe ti adhippāyaḥ pacchima koṭṭhāse ti sabbesam cavantānam

original: pavatte cittassabhaṅgakkhaṇeti imasmiṃ pacchima pakkhe. Cavantānaṃ icceva vuttaṃ
analyzed: pavatte imasmin pacchima pakkhe cavantānam icca eva vuttam

original: siyā, na pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇeti, no ca na vuttaṃ, tasmā viññāyati pavatte
analyzed: siyā na pavatte cittassa bhaṅga kkhaṇe iti no ca na vuttam tasmā viññāyati pavatte
