analyzed: cittassa bhaṅga kkhaṇe rūpa jīvita indriyam pi na uppajjati iti rūpa jīvita indriye ca anuppajjamāne

original: sati, sabbāni kammajarūpāni utujarūpāni āhārajarūpāni ca cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe nuppajjantīti
analyzed: sati sabbāni kamma ja rūpāni utu ja rūpāni āhāra ja rūpāni ca cittassa bhaṅga kkhaṇe nuppajjanti iti

original: viññātabbaṃ hotīti adhippāyo. “Pacchimakoṭṭhāse”ti sabbesaṃ cavantānaṃ pavatte cittassa
analyzed: viññātabbam hoti iti adhippāyaḥ pacchima koṭṭhāse ti sabbesam cavantānam pavatte cittassa

original: bhaṅgakkhaṇeti imasmiṃ pacchimapakkhe. Tattha ca pavatte cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇeti
analyzed: bhaṅga kkhaṇe ti imasmim pacchima pakkhe tattha ca pavatte cittassa bhaṅga kkhaṇe ti

original: idaṃ adhippetaṃ. Evaṃ pāḷisādhakaṃ dassetvā idāni yuttisādhakaṃ dassento “yasmā cā”tiādimāha.
analyzed: idam adhippetam evam pāḷi sādhakam dassetvā idāni yutti sādhakam dassentaḥ yasmā ca ati ādim āha

original: “Tassā”ti ānandā cariyassa mūlaṭīkākārassa. Vibhāvaniyaṃ. Bhaṅge rūpassa nuppādo,
analyzed: tassa ati ānandā cariyassa mūla ṭīkākārassa bhaṅge rūpassa nuppādaḥ

original: cittajānaṃ vasena vā. Āruppaṃ vāpi sandhāya, bhāsito yamakassa hi. Na cittaṭṭhiti
analyzed: citta jānam vasena vā āruppam vā api sandhāya bhāsitaḥ yamakassa hi na citta ṭṭhiti

original: bhaṅge ca, na rūpassa asambhavo. Ti vuttaṃ. Tattha “na hi na cittaṭṭhitī”ti cittassaṭhiti
analyzed: bhaṅge ca na rūpassa asambhavaḥ ti vuttam tattha na hi na citta ṭhiti iti

original: nāma na hi natthi. “Bhaṅgecā”ti cittassabhaṅgakkhaṇe ca. Taṃ asambhāvento “yamakapāḷiyo
analyzed: nāma na hi natthi cittassa bhaṅga kkhaṇe ca tam a sambhāventaḥ yamaka pāḷiyaḥ

original: panā”tiādimāha. “Nānatthā nānābyañjanā”ti etena pāḷisaṃsandanā nāma garukattabbāti
analyzed: pana ati ādim āha nānatthā nānā byañjanā ti etena pāḷisaṃsandanā nāma garukattabbā ti

original: dīpeti. “Gambhīro ca satthu adhippāyo”ti etena attānaṃ satthumataññuṃ katvā idaṃ
analyzed: dīpeti gambhīraḥ ca satthu adhippāyaḥ ti etena attānam katvā idam

original: sandhāya etaṃ sandhāyāti vattuṃ dukkaranti dīpeti. “Suddhaṃ arūpamevā”ti suddhaṃ
analyzed: sandhāya etam sandhāya ati vattum dīpa iti suddham arūpam eva ati suddham

original: arūpappaṭisandhiṃ eva. Cha cattālīsacittāni rūpaṃ janetuṃ na sakkonti. Evaṃ sati
analyzed: arūpa ppaṭisandhim eva cha cattālīsa cittāni rūpam janetum na sakkonti evam sati

original: arūpavipākavajjitanti kasmā vuttanti āha “arūpavipākāpanā”tiādiṃ. Vibhāvanipāṭhe.
analyzed: arūpa vipāka vajjitanti kasmā vuttanti āha arūpa vipāka āpanā ati ādim vibhāvani pāṭhe

original: “Hetuno”ti rūpavirāgabhāvanā kammasaṅkhātassa hetussa. “Tabbīdhuratāyā”ti rūpaviruddhatāya.
analyzed: hetunā iti rūpa virāga bhāvanā kamma saṅkhātassa hetussa tad bīdhura tāya ati rūpa viruddha tāya

original: Rūpārūpavirāgabhāvanābhūto maggo. Tena nibbattassa. Rūpokāso nāma kāmarūpabhavo.
analyzed: rūpa arūpa virāga bhāvanā bhūtaḥ maggo tena nibbattassa rūpokāsaḥ nāma kāma rūpa bhavaḥ

original: Vibhāvanipāṭhe. “Ekūna na vutibhavaṅgasse vā”ti pavattikāle rūpajanakassa ekūna na
analyzed: vibhāvani pāṭhe ekūna na vuti bhavaṅgassa vāti pavatti kāle rūpa janakassa ekūna na

original: vutibhavaṅga cittassāti attho. Tattha pana arūpavipākaṃ pavattikālepi rūpajanakaṃ
analyzed: cittassa ti atthaḥ tattha pana arūpa vipākam pavatti kāle pi rūpa janakam

original: na hotīti āha “tatthā”tiādiṃ. Keci pana paṭisandhi cittassa uppādakkhaṇe rūpaṃ pacchājāta
analyzed: na hoti iti āha tattha atiādim keci pana paṭisandhi cittassa uppāda khaṇe rūpam pacchājāta

original: paccayaṃ na labhati. Ṭhitikkhaṇe rūpaṃ parato bhavaṅgacittato pacchājātapaccayaṃ
analyzed: paccayam na labhati ṭhiti kkhaṇe rūpam paratas bhavaṅga cittataḥ pacchājāta paccayam

original: labhatīti vadanti. Taṃ na gahetabbanti dassetuṃ “na hi attanā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Sayaṃ
analyzed: labhati iti vadanti tam na gahetabbanti dassetum na hi attanā atiādi vuttam sayam

original: vijjamāno hutvā upakārako paccayo atthipaccayo. Pacchājāto ca tassa ekadeso. “Āyusaṅkhārānaṃ”ti
analyzed: vijjamānaḥ hutvā upakārakaḥ paccayaḥ atthi paccayo pacchājātaḥ ca tassa eka desaḥ āyu saṅkhārānaṃ ti

original: usmādīnaṃ. “Taṃ”ti khīṇāsavānaṃ cuticittaṃ. “Yathāhā”ti so thero kiṃ āha. “Vuttaṃ”ti
analyzed: usma ādīnam khīṇāsavānam cuti cittam yathā āha ati saḥ theraḥ kim āha vuttam ti

original: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ. Iti pana vacanato aññesaṃpi cuticittaṃ rūpaṃ na samuṭṭhāpetīti
analyzed: aṭṭhakathā ayam vuttam iti pana vacanato aññesam pi cuti cittam rūpam na samuṭṭhāpeti iti

original: viññāyatīti padhānavacanaṃ. Pana saddo aruci jotako. “Tathā vuttepī”ti joteti. Vacīsaṅkhāro
analyzed: viññāyati iti padhāna vacanam pana saddaḥ aruci jotakaḥ tathā vutte pi iti jotā iti vacī saṅkhāro

original: nāma vitakkavicāro. Kāyasaṅkhāro nāma assāsapassāsavāto. So sabbesaṃpi kāmasattānaṃ
analyzed: nāma vitakka vicāraḥ kāya saṅkhāro nāma assāsa passāsa vāto so sabbesam pi kāma sattānam

original: cuti cittassa uppādakkhaṇe ca tato purimacittassa uppādakkhaṇe ca nanirujjhatīti
analyzed: cuti cittassa uppāda kkhaṇe ca tatas purima cittassa uppāda kkhaṇe ca na nirujjhati iti

original: vacanena cuticittato pubbabhāgeyeva assāsapassāsānaṃ abhāvaṃ ñāpeti. Nanu imissaṃ
analyzed: vacanena cuti cittataḥ assāsa passāsānam abhāvam ñāpeti nanu imissam

original: pāḷiyaṃ cutikāle assāsapassāsassa abhāvaṃ vadati. Aññesaṃ cittajarūpānaṃ abhāvaṃ
analyzed: pāḷiyam cuti kāle assāsa passāsassa abhāvam vadati aññesam citta ja rūpānam abhāvam

original: na vadati. Tasmā imāya pāḷiyā sabbesampi cuticittaṃ assāsapassāsaṃ na janetīti viññāyati.
analyzed: na vadati tasmai imāya pāḷiyā sabbesam pi cuti cittam assāsa passāsam na janeti iti viññāyati

original: Na aññāni cittajarūpānīti codanā. Taṃ pariharanto “na hī”tiādimāha. Na hi rūpasamuṭṭhāpakacittassa

original: saheva khiyyantī”ti paccuppannabhave arahattamaggakkhaṇe kilesakkhayena saddhiṃ eva
analyzed: saha iva khiyyanti iti paccuppanna bhave arahatta magga kkhaṇe kilesa kkhayena saddhim eva

original: khiyyanti. Anuppāda dhammataṃ gacchanti. Tathā anāgāmi puggalassa kāmapaṭisandhikkhandhāpi
analyzed: khiyyanti anuppāda dhamma taṃ gacchanti tathā anāgāmi puggalassa kāma paṭisandhi khandhā api

original: anāgāmimaggakkhaṇe, sotāpannassa sattabhaveṭhapetvā avasesa kāmapaṭisandhikkhandhā
analyzed: anāgāmi magga khaṇe sotāpannassa satta bhave ṭhapetvā avasesa kāma paṭisandhi khandhāḥ

original: sotāpatti maggakkhaṇe taṃ taṃ kilesakkhaye na saheva khiyyantīti. Paccuppannakkhandhā
analyzed: sotāpatti magga kkhaṇe tam tam kilesa kkhaye na saha iva khiyyanti iti paccuppanna khandhā

original: pana kilesakkhayena sahakhiyyanti. Khandhupādisesā nāma hutvā yāvamaraṇakālā khīṇāsavānampi
analyzed: pana kilesa kkhayena sahakhiyyanti khandhupādisesāḥ nāma hutvā yāvamaraṇakālā khīṇa āsavānam pi

original: pavattanti. Kasmā pavattantīti āha “yāvacutiyā pavattamānaṃ”tiādiṃ. Paccuppannakkhandhasantānaṃ

original: hutvā. “Tenasahevā”ti kilesakkhayena saheva. “Yasmāpanā”tiādīsu. Parisamantato bundhanti

original: nīvārenti, santisukhassa antarāyaṃ karontīti palibodhā. Kilesābhisaṅkharaṇa kiccāni,

original: kammābhisaṅkharaṇakiccāni, khandhābhisaṅkharaṇa kiccāni ca. Palibodhehi saha vattantīti

analyzed: sa palibodhā saṅkhāra nimittehi saha vattanti iti sa nimittā taṇhā paṇidhīhi saha vattanti iti

original: sapaṇihitā.“Tato”ti pāpakammato, apāyadukkhato ca. “Kocī”ti kocidhammo. “Nirodhetuṃ
analyzed: pāpa kammataḥ apāya dukkhataḥ ca koci iti koci dhammaḥ nirodhetum

original: sakkotī”ti sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā niruddhāya te nirujjhanti. Aniruddhāya nanirujjhanti.
analyzed: sakkoti iti sakkāya diṭṭhiyāḥ niruddhāya te nirujjhanti a niruddhāya na nirujjhanti

original: Tasmā sakkāyadiṭṭhi nirodho nibyāpāradhammopi samāno te palibodhe nirodheti nāma.

analyzed: ca uppāda pavattā te mūlam yassa ati viggahaḥ yena oḷārika ākārena mārenti iti mārā

original: Vadhakapaccatthikāti vuttaṃ hoti. Kilesamārādayo. Mārā dahanti tiṭṭhanti etesūti
analyzed: vadhaka paccatthikā iti vuttam hoti kilesa māra ādayaḥ mārāḥ dahanti tiṭṭhanti etesu iti

original: māradheyyā. Māreti cāveti cāti maccu. Maraṇameva. Maccudahati tiṭṭhati etesūti maccudheyyā.
analyzed: māradheyyā māreti ca aveti ca ati maccu maraṇam eva maccu dahati tiṭṭhati etesu uti maccudheyyā

original: “Natthi tasmiṃ nimittaṃ”ti vutte paññattidhammesupi uppādappavattamūlaṃ nimittaṃ

original: nāma natthi. Evaṃsati, tehi nibbānassa aviseso āpajjatīti codanā. Taṃ pariharanto
analyzed: nāma na atthi evaṃsati tehi nibbānassa avisesaḥ āpajjati iti codanā tam pariharanto

original: “tañhī”tiādimāha. Viddhaṃsetvāti ca sādhentanti ca atthavisesa pākaṭatthāya abyāpāre
analyzed: tat hi itiādim āha ca ca attha visesa a byāpāre

original: byāpāra parikappanā eva. Paṇītādibhede. Idaṃ buddhānaṃ nibbānaṃ paṇītaṃ. Idaṃ paccekabuddhānaṃ
analyzed: byāpāra parikappanā eva paṇīta ādi bhede idam buddhānam nibbānam paṇītam idam paccekabuddhānam

original: nibbānaṃ majjhimaṃ. Idaṃ buddhasāvakānaṃ nibbānaṃ hīnanti bhinnaṃ na hotīti yojetabbaṃ.
analyzed: nibbānam majjhimam idam buddha sāvakānam nibbānam hīnam nti bhinnam na hoti iti yojetabbam

original: Nānappakārena cittaṃ nidheti etenāti paṇihitaṃ. “Nidhetī”ti ārammaṇesu ninnaṃ poṇaṃ

original: pabbhāraṃ katvā ṭhapetīti attho. Tathā paṇidhānapaṇidhīsu. Atthato ekaṃ āsātaṇhāya
analyzed: pabbhāram katvā ṭhapeti iti tathā paṇidhāna paṇidhīsu atthataḥ ekam āsā taṇhāya

original: nāmaṃ. “Labbhamānāpī”ti bhavasampatti bhogasampattiyo labbhamānāpi. “Pipāsavinaya
analyzed: nāmam labbhamānā api iti bhava sampatti bhoga sampattiyaḥ labbhamānā api pipāsa vinaya

original: dhammattā”ti pātuṃ paribhuñjituṃ icchā pipāsā. Pipāsaṃ vineti vigametīti pipāsavinayo.
analyzed: pātum paribhuñjitum icchā pipāsā pipāsam vinā iti vigameti iti pipāsa vinayaḥ

original: “Vedayitasukhaṃ”ti vedanāsukhaṃ. “Katamaṃ taṃ āvuso”ti pāḷipāṭhe “taṃ”ti tasmā. “Yadettha
analyzed: vedayita sukham ti vedanā sukham katamam tat āvuso iti pāḷi pāṭhe tat tasmai yat īttha

original: vedayitaṃ natthī”ti yasmā ettha vedayitaṃ natthi. Tasmā nibbāne sukhaṃ nāma katamanti
analyzed: vedayitam natthi iti yasmai ettha vedayitam na atthi tasmai nibbāne sukham nāma katamanti

original: yojanā. “Etthā”ti etasmiṃ nibbāne. “Etadevetthā”tiādimhi. “Eta devā”ti esoeva. Yasmā
analyzed: yojanā ettha ati etasmin nibbāne etat eva itthā ati ādimhi eta deva ati yasmā

original: ettha vedayitaṃ natthi. Tasmā eso vedayitassa natthibhāvo eva etthanibbāne sukhanti yojanā.
analyzed: ettha vedayitam natthi tasmai esaḥ vedayitassa natthi bhāvaḥ eva ettha nibbāne sukham ti yojanā

original: vīriyaṃ daḷhaṃ karoti. Pahito attā anenāti pahitatto. “Pahito”ti padahito. Anivattabhāve
analyzed: vīriyam daḷham karoti pahitaḥ attā anena ati pahitattaḥ pahitaḥ iti a nivatta bhāve

original: ṭhapito. Pesitotipi vaṇṇenti. “Kāyenā”ti nāmakāyena. Taṇhāvase vattantīti taṇhāvasikā.
analyzed: ṭhapito pesito tipi vaṇṇenti kāyena ati nāmakāyena taṇhā vase vattanti iti taṇhāvasikā

original: “Tesaṃ pī”ti tesaṃ vādepi. Tasmiṃ khaya nirodhamatte anantaguṇā nāma natthīti imaṃ
analyzed: tesam pi iti tesam vāde pi tasmin khaya nirodha matte anantaguṇā nāma natthi iti imaṃ

original: passantīti dīpeti. Ye pana yathāvuttaṃ khayanirodhaṃ paramatthanibbānanti na jānanti,
analyzed: passanti iti dīpeti ye pana yathā vuttam khaya nirodham paramattha nibbānam ti na jānanti

original: Atthibhikkhaveti sutte. “Nocetaṃ abhavissā”ti etaṃ ajātaṃ noce santaṃ vijjamānaṃ

analyzed: na bhaveyya na imassa ati na imassa paccakkha bhūtam khandha pañcakam dassento imassa ati

analyzed: nāma na paññāyeyya ti yojanā sabbesu utiādīsu

original: dhammā nāma paccaye sati, jāyanti. Asati, na jāyantīti evaṃ jātaṃ viya ajātampi tesaṃ
analyzed: dhammā nāma paccaye sati jāyanti asati na jāyanti iti evam jātam viya ajātam pi tesam

original: Nibbānasaṅgahānudīpanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: nibbāna saṅgaha anudīpanā niṭṭhitā

original: 7. Samuccayasaṅgahaanudīpanā
162. Samuccayasaṅgahe. Attano āveṇikabhūtena sāmañña lakkhaṇenati ca sambandho. Aññāpadesena
analyzed: samuccaya saṅgahe attanaḥ āveṇika bhūtena sāmañña lakkhaṇena iti ca sambandhaḥ añña apadesena

original: eva tadubhayalakkhaṇena salakkhaṇāni nāma vuccantīti adhippāyo. “Nibbānassapi sarūpato
analyzed: eva tad ubhaya lakkhaṇena salakkhaṇāni nāma vuccanti iti adhippāyaḥ nibbānassa api sarūpato

original: labbhamānasabhāvatā”ti aññanissaya rahitena labbhamānasabhāvatā. Nanu nibbānampi
analyzed: labbhamāna sabhāva tā ti añña nissaya rahitena labbhamāna sabhāva tā nanu nibbānam pi

original: rāgakkhayo dosakkhayo mohakkhayotiādinā aññanissayadassanaṃ atthi yevāti. Dassanamattaṃ
analyzed: rāga kkhayaḥ dosa kkhayaḥ moha kkhayaḥ ti ādinā añña nissaya dassanam atthi yeva ati dassana mattam

original: atthi. Nibbānaṃ pana rāgādīhi paṭibaddhaṃ na hoti. Atha kho tehi dūrataraṃ hoti.
analyzed: atthi nibbānam pana rāga ādīhi paṭibaddham na hoti atha kho tehi dūrataram hoti

original: Paṭipakkhataraṃ, paṭiviruddhataraṃ. Yañhi rūpassa khayo vayo bhedo aniccāti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: paṭipakkhataram paṭiviruddhataram yat hi rūpassa khayaḥ vayaḥ bhedaḥ anicca ati vuttam

original: Tattha rūpassa uppajjitvā khayo vuttoti so rūpassa nissito eva hoti. Idha pana rāgādīnaṃ
analyzed: tattha rūpassa uppajjitvā khayaḥ vuttaḥ ti so rūpassa nissitaḥ eva hoti idha pana rāga ādīnam

original: puna uppādassapi abhāvo vuttoti so rāgādīsu anissito eva. Na kevalaṃ anissito. Atha
analyzed: puna uppādassa api abhāvaḥ vutto ti saḥ rāga ādīsu anissitaḥ eva na kevalam anissitaḥ atha

original: kho tehi dūrataro ca paṭipakkhataro ca tesaṃ paṭipakkhaguṇehi imassasiddhattāti.

original: Anipphannarūpānipi adhippetāni eva tesampi khandhāyatanadhātu saccesu saṅgahitattā.
analyzed: anipphanna rūpāni api adhippetāni eva tesam pi khandha āyatana dhātu saccesu saṅgahita ttā

original: Āsavādīsu. “Pārivāsiyaṭṭhenā”ti parivāsakaraṇaṭṭhena. “Madanīyaṭṭhenā”ti madanajanakaṭṭhena.
analyzed: āsava ādīsu pārivāsiya ṭṭhena ati parivāsa karaṇa ṭṭhena madanīya ṭṭhena ati madana janaka ṭṭhena

original: “Parivāsaṃ gaṇhantī”ti dosavepullaṃ āpajjantīti vuttaṃ hoti. Puna “parivāsaṃ”ti duggandhatādiparivāsaṃ.
analyzed: parivāsam gaṇhanti iti dosa vepullam āpajjanti iti vuttam hoti puna parivāsam ti duggandha tā ādi parivāsam

original: “Āsavabharitamevā”ti āsavehi pūritameva. “Chaḷārammaṇāni dūsentī”ti tāni sāsavādibhāvaṃ
analyzed: āsava bharitam eva ati āsavehi pūritam eva chaṭ ārammaṇāni dūsenti iti tāni sa āsava ādi bhāvam

original: mariyādavisayo. Avadhi nāma byāpana vidhānaṃ, kriyā byāpanassa visayo abhividhivisayo.
analyzed: avadhi nāma byāpana vidhānam kriyā byāpanassa visayaḥ abhividhi visayaḥ

original: “Yassā”ti avadhi vatthussa. “Attānaṃ”ti avadhivatthuṃ. “Bahikatvā”ti sampattamattaṃ

original: katvāti adhippāyo. Avadhivicāraṇāyaṃ. “Saddassā”ti bhagavato kittisaddassa. “Taṃ”ti
analyzed: katvā iti adhippāyaḥ avadhi vicāraṇā ayam saddassa ati bhagavataḥ kitti saddassa tam ti

original: avadhibhūtaṃ atthaṃ. “Yaso”ti kittisaddo. “Itaraṃ”ti anabhividhivisayaṃ bahi katvā pavattati.
analyzed: avadhi bhūtam attham yasaḥ ti kitti saddaḥ itaran ti anabhividhi visayam bahi katvā pavattati

original: Kāmāsavādīsu. “Tannāmenā”ti kāmanāmena. “Tadārammaṇā”ti kāmadhammārammaṇā. “Ayamattho
analyzed: kāma āsava ādīsu tad nāmena ati kāma nāmena tad ārammaṇā ati kāma dhamma ārammaṇā ayam attho

original: vā”ti kāmīyatītiādinā vutto pacchimatthova. “Mahaggatakusaladhammā”ti idhādhippetaṃ
analyzed: vāti kāmīyati iti ādinā vuttaḥ mahaggata kusala dhammā ti idha adhippetam

original: kammabhavaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. “Taṃ nibbattā”ti tena nibbattā. “Tadārammaṇā”ti duvidhabhavārammaṇā.
analyzed: kamma bhavam sandhāya vuttam tam nibbattā ati tena nibbattā tad ārammaṇā ti duvidha bhava ārammaṇā

original: “Taṇhā evā”ti bhavataṇhā eva. “Bhavo evā”ti bhavārammaṇatāya bhavanāmikā taṇhā eva.

original: “Ime evā”ti taṇhādiṭṭhi avijjā eva. “Parivutthe satī”ti parivasite sati. “Kāmavisayā”ti

original: kāmadhammavisayā. “Tasmiṃ”ti kāmāsave. Bhavavisayā mānādayo parivutthā evātiādinā

analyzed: vaṭṭasmin ti tividha vaṭṭasmin bhavayantaka iti avijjā saṅkhāra ādike bhava cakke

analyzed: vinimutta ati ādim sa anusaye citta santāne iti sekkha puthujjanānam citta santāne saha

original: Tabbhāve bhavanti sambhavanti sīlenāti tabbhāvabhāvino. Saṅkhārādayo. “Bhāvo”ti uppattikāraṇaṃ.

analyzed: vāyu vaṭṭīti vāta parimaṇḍalam canda sūriyānam aggissa ca obhāsena visiṭṭhā ti samāso

original: “Visiṭṭhā”ti visesitā.
analyzed: visiṭṭhā iti visesitā

original: “Dhūmātaṃ”ti dhūmāyitaṃ. Dhūmapūritapaṭaṃ viyāti vuttaṃ hoti. Tenāha “sūnabhāvaṃ
analyzed: dhūmātam ti dhūmāyitam dhūma pūrita paṭam viyā iti vuttam hoti tena āha sūna bhāvam

original: gataṃ”ti. Ante kakāro nindatthajotakoti vuttaṃ “kucchitattā”ti. Jegucchi tabbattāti
analyzed: gatam ti ante kakāraḥ ninda attha jotakaḥ iti vuttam kucchita ttā ati jegucchi tabba ttā ati

original: attho. “Chavasarīrassā”ti lāmakasarīrassa. “Tadevā”ti chavasarīrameva. Vipubbakaṃ
analyzed: attho chava sarīrassa ati lāmaka sarīrassa tat eva ati chava sarīram eva vipubbakam

original: vicchinnakaṃ nāmāti sambandho. Tattha visesena nīlantivinīlaṃ. Tameva kucchitattā
analyzed: vicchinnakam nāma ati sambandho tattha visesena tam eva

original: vinīlakaṃ. “Tadeva puna paccitvā”ti vinīlakasarīrameva puna kālātikkame paccitvā.
analyzed: vinīlakam tat eva puna paccitvā ati vinīlaka sarīram eva puna kāla atikkame paccitvā

original: Pūtilohitānaṃ paripakkabhāvaṃ patvāti attho. Tato tato dvāracchiddato. Yuttaṃ tadeva
analyzed: pūti lohitānam paripakka bhāvam tatas tatas dvāra chiddataḥ yuttam tat eva

original: “Buddhānussatī”ti ettha buddhasaddo guṇyūpacāra vacanaṃ hoti. Guṇino dabbassa nāmena

original: “Arahatādī”ti arahatādiguṇo. Vigatāni dussilyādi malāni ca maccherañca yassa taṃ

original: disvā tena parahitena attani pītipāmojjavaḍḍhanaṃ hitamodanā nāma. Paraṃ dukkhitaṃ

original: tāhi appamaññāhi samaṅgīno puggalā. “Niccaṃ sommahadayabhāvenā”ti sabbakālaṃ santasītala

original: Asitabbaṃ bhuñjitabbanti asitaṃ. Pañcabhojanaṃ. Pātabbanti pītaṃ. Aṭṭhavidhaṃ pānaṃ.

analyzed: siyā visuddhi magge pana evam vuttam natthi iti adhippāyaḥ vibhāvani pāṭhe buddhi visaya

analyzed: kassa iti vuttam hoti tena āha gūtha rāsi dassane viyāti na te kadāci somanassena

original: vinā appanaṃ pāpuṇanti. Byāpādavihiṃsā aratīnaṃ dūribhāvena somanassuppattiyā atisukarattā

original: pañcamajjhāne viya sukhasomanassānañca avikkhambhanato. “Udāsinapakkhe”ti ajjhupekkhanapakkhe.

original: “Daḷhaṃ”ti bhusaṃ. “Vibhūtaṃ”ti pākaṭaṃ. Nimittaṃ daḷhavibhūtaṃ katvā gahaṇaṃ daḷha
analyzed: daḷham bhusam pākaṭam nimittam daḷha vibhūtam katvā gahaṇam daḷha

analyzed: attho vasim bhūtam pattanti vasi bhūtam vasī eva vasitā yathā

analyzed: ṭhapetum ti adhiṭṭhānam katvā ṭhapetum tatas an atikkamitum yatthicchakam ti ādīni

analyzed: adhiṭṭhānam abhiññāya adhiṭṭhānanti idha pana abhiññāya adhiṭṭhānam vuttam adhiṭṭhāna

analyzed: cittena ati abhiññā cittena ati vuttam hoti parikamma cittassa āti pubba bhāge āvajjana

original: Parikammacittassa samādhānatthāyāti vuttaṃ. Parikammacitte samāhite kiṃ payojananti

original: vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Paracitta vijānanaṭṭhāne aṭṭhakathāṭīkācariyānaṃ vicāraṇā atthīti
analyzed: vuttanti daṭṭhabbam para citta vijānana ṭṭhāne aṭṭhakathā ṭīkā cariyānam vicāraṇā atthi iti

original: taṃ dassetuṃ “ettha ca aṭṭhakathāyaṃ tāvā”tiādi vuttaṃ. “Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ”ti dhammasaṅgaṇi
analyzed: tam dassetum ettha ca aṭṭhakathāyam tāva ātiādi vuttam aṭṭhakathāyam ti dhamma saṅgaṇi

original: aṭṭhakathāyaṃpi visuddhimagga aṭṭhakathāyaṃpi. “Khaṇikavasenā”ti khaṇikapaccuppannavasena.
analyzed: aṭṭhakathāyam pi visuddhi magga aṭṭhakathāyam pi khaṇika vasena āti khaṇika paccuppanna vasena

original: Āvajjane niruddheti sambandho. “Ekaṃ cittaṃ”ti parassa cittaṃ. Tadeva atītaṃ cittaṃ
analyzed: āvajjane niruddhā iti sambandhaḥ ekam cittam ti parassa cittam tat eva atītam cittam

original: gaṇhanti. “Tānī”ti javanāni. “Tesaṃ”ti javanānaṃ. “Tenā”ti āvajjanena. “Itarathā”ti
analyzed: gaṇhanti tāni iti javanāni tena ati āvajjanena itarathā iti

original: aññathā santati addhāvasena vuttanti gahite sati. Vutto siyā. Kasmā, santati addhāvasena
analyzed: aññathā santati addhā vasena vuttanti gahite sati vuttaḥ siyā kasmā santati addhā vasena

original: paccuppanne gahite sati, sabbāya ekajavanavīthiyā ekapaccuppannattā. “Sabbāni cittānī”ti
analyzed: paccuppanne gahite sati sabbāyaḥ eka javana vīthiyāḥ eka paccuppanna ttā sabbāni cittāni iti

original: javanacittāni. “Sahuppannānī”ti idaṃ sahuppannānaṃpi atthitāya vuttaṃ. Āvajjanādīni
analyzed: javana cittāni sahuppannāni iti idam sahuppannānam pi atthitāya vuttam āvajjana ādīni

original: pana khaṇabhedaṃ nagaṇhanti. Sabbaṃ parassa cittaṃ ekacittamiva gaṇhanti. Tasmā kālabhedopi
analyzed: pana khaṇa bhedam na gaṇhanti sabbam parassa cittam eka cittam iva gaṇhanti tasmā kāla bhedaḥ api

original: natthīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. “Nibbānañcā”ti vuttaṃ, kathaṃ nibbānaṃ pubbenivutthaṃ nāma siyāti.
analyzed: natthi iti daṭṭhabbam nibbānam ca ati vuttam katham nibbānam pubbenivuttham nāma siyāti

original: Atīte parinibbutānaṃ maggaphalāni anussaraṇakāle tesaṃ ārammaṇabhūtaṃ nibbānaṃpi
analyzed: atīte parinibbutānam magga phalāni anussaraṇa kāle tesam ārammaṇa bhūtam nibbānam pi

original: anussaratiyeva. Tattha tesaṃ maggaphalānaṃ atītattā nibbānaṃpi pubbenivutthaṃ nāma hotīti.
analyzed: anussaratiyā iva tattha tesam magga phalānam atīta ttā nibbānam pi pubbenivuttham nāma hoti iti

original: “Yaṃ yaṃ adhiṭṭhātī”ti yaṃ yaṃ satādikaṃ saṃvidhāti. “Yathā yathā adhiṭṭhātī”ti yena
analyzed: yam yam adhiṭṭhāti iti yam yam sata ādikam saṃvidhāti yathā yathā adhiṭṭhāti iti yena

original: yena āvibhāvādikena pakārena saṃvidhāti. “Pakativaṇṇaṃ”ti pakatisaṇṭhānaṃ. “Tassevā”ti
analyzed: yena āvi bhāva ādikena pakārena pakati vaṇṇam ti pakati saṇṭhānam tassa iva āti

original: pakativaṇṇasseva. Devānaṃ pasādasotanti sambandho. “Ārammaṇa sampaṭicchana samatthaṃ”ti
analyzed: pakati vaṇṇassa iva devānam pasāda sotanti sambandhaḥ

original: ārammaṇassa upaṭṭhānaṃ sampaṭicchana samatthaṃ. Tadeva cetopariyañāṇantipi vuccatīti
analyzed: ārammaṇassa upaṭṭhānam sampaṭicchana samattham tat eva vuccati iti

original: sambandho. “Ceto”ti cittaṃ. “Paricchijjā”ti idaṃ sarāgacittaṃ, idaṃ virāgacittantiādinā
analyzed: sambandho cittam paricchijjāti idam sa rāga cittam idam virāga cittam ti ādinā

original: paricchinditvā. “Gocara nivāsavasenā”ti gocaraṃ katvā nivasanavasena. Sabbaññutaññāṇagatikaṃ
analyzed: paricchinditvā gocara nivāsa vasena ati gocaram katvā nivasana vasena sabbaññuta ññāṇa gatikam

original: sabbaññubuddhānaṃ anāgataṃ saññāṇanti adhippāyo. Anāgate sattadivasato orimā cittacetasika
analyzed: sabbaññu buddhānam anāgatam saññāṇanti adhippāyaḥ anāgate satta divasato

original: dhammā cetopariyaññāṇassa visayoti katvā anāgate sattadivasatoti vuttaṃ. Paṭṭhāya
analyzed: dhammā cetas pariyaññāṇassa visayo ti katvā anāgate satta divasato ti vuttam paṭṭhāya

original: pavattamānāti pāṭhaseso. Imasmiṃ divase ca anāgatapakkhe sabbaṃpi ārammaṇaṃ pakatiñāṇassa
analyzed: pavattamānā iti pāṭha sesaḥ imasmin divase ca anāgata pakkhe sabbam pi ārammaṇam pakati ñāṇassa

original: visayoti katvā “dutīyadivasato paṭṭhāyā”ti vuttaṃ. “Etaṃ”ti etaṃ anāgataṃ saññāṇaṃ.
analyzed: visayaḥ ti katvā dutīya divasataḥ paṭṭhāya ati vuttaṃ etam ti etam anāgatam saññāṇam

original: “Yathā cetaṃ”ti yathā ca etaṃ imasmiṃ bhave anāgata dhamme jānāti. “Asādhāraṇakālavasenā”ti
analyzed: yathā yathā ca etam imasmin bhave anāgata dhamme jānāti asādhāraṇa kāla vasena ati

original: aññenañāṇena asādhāraṇa kālavasena. Paccuppannabhavohi aññaññāṇasādhāraṇoti.
analyzed: aññena ñāṇena asādhāraṇa kāla vasena paccuppanna bhavaḥ hi añña ññāṇa sādhāraṇaḥ ti

original: Samathakammaṭṭhānānudīpanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: samatha kammaṭṭhāna anudīpanā niṭṭhitā

original: 171. Vipassanākammaṭṭhāne. “Yathādiṭṭhaṃ”ti sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā yathādiṭṭhaṃ. Niccanimittaṃ
analyzed: vipassanā kammaṭṭhāne yathādiṭṭham ti sakkāyadiṭṭhiyāḥ yathādiṭṭham nicca nimittam

original: nāma sattapuggalādinimittameva. Sattanimittañhi paññatti dhammattā khaṇekhaṇe khayavayabhedābhāvato
analyzed: nāma satta puggala ādi nimittam eva satta nimittam hi paññatti dhamma ttā khaṇe khaṇe khaya vaya bheda abhāvato

original: so evagacchati so eva tiṭṭhatītiādinā niccākārasaṇṭhitaṃ hotīti. “Dhuvanimittaṃ”ti
analyzed: saḥ eva gacchati saḥ eva tiṭṭhati iti ādinā nicca ākāra saṇṭhitam hoti iti dhuva nimittam ti

original: thiranimittaṃ. Idampi so gacchantopi nanassati, tiṭṭhantopi nanassatītiādinā thirākārasaṇṭhitaṃ
analyzed: thira nimittam idam pi saḥ gacchantaḥ api nanassati tiṭṭhantaḥ api nanassati iti ādinā thira ākāra saṇṭhitam

original: sattanimittameva. “Sukhanimittaṃ”ti khaṇekhaṇe khayavayabheda dukkhānaṃ abhāvato
analyzed: satta nimittam eva sukha nimittam ti khaṇe khaṇe khaya vaya bheda dukkhānaṃ abhāvato

original: sukhito niddukkho nibbhayotiādinā sukhākārasaṇṭhitaṃ sattanimittameva. “Attanimittaṃ”ti
analyzed: sukhitaḥ niddukkhaḥ nibbhayaḥ ti ādinā sukha ākāra saṇṭhitam satta nimittam eva atta nimittam ti

original: gantuṃ icchanto gacchati, ṭhātuṃ icchanto tiṭṭhatītiādinā vasavattanākāra saṇṭhitaṃ
analyzed: gantum icchantaḥ gacchati ṭhātum icchantaḥ tiṭṭhati itiādinā

original: sattanimittameva. “Kiriyā”ti bhāvanākiriyā.
analyzed: satta nimittam eva kiriyā ati bhāvanā kiriyā

original: Visujjhatīti visuddhi. Visodhetīti vā visuddhi. Sīlameva visuddhi sīlavisuddhīti
analyzed: visujjhati iti visuddhi visodheti iti vā visuddhi sīlam eva visuddhi sīla visuddhi iti

original: imamatthaṃ dassento “niccasīlamevā”tiādimāha. Tattha niccasīlameva uparijhānādivisesānaṃ
analyzed: imam attham dassentaḥ nicca sīlam eva ati ādim āha tattha nicca sīlam eva upari jhāna ādi visesānam

original: adhiṭṭhāna kiccasādhakattā idha adhippetanti vuttaṃ “niccasīlamevā”ti. Samādhi adhippeto.
analyzed: adhiṭṭhāna kicca sādhaka ttā idha adhippetanti vuttam nicca sīlam eva ti samādhi adhippeto

original: Vakkhatihi “duvidhopi samādhi cittavisuddhi nāmā”ti. Etena visujjhati etāyāti visuddhi.
analyzed: duvidhaḥ pi samādhi citta visuddhi nāma ati etena visujjhati etāya ati visuddhi

original: Cittassa visuddhi cittavisuddhi. Samādhi evātipi dīpeti. Visujjhanaṃ vā visuddhi.
analyzed: cittassa visuddhi citta visuddhi samādhi dīpeti visujjhanam vā

original: Cittassa visuddhi cittavisuddhi. Atthatopana visuddhacittameva vuccatītipi yujjati.
analyzed: cittassa visuddhi citta visuddhi visuddha cittam eva yujjati

original: Visuddhisadda sampanne hi sati, cittavisuddhi icceva vuccati. Na samādhivisuddhīti.
analyzed: visuddhi sadda sampanne hi sati citta visuddhi icca eva vuccati na samādhi visuddhi iti

original: “Soḷasavidhaṃ kaṅkhaṃ”ti ahosiṃ nu kho aha matītamaddhānantiādinā suttanteāgataṃ
analyzed: soḷasavidham nu kho aha matītam addhā ananti ādinā suttante āgatam

original: soḷasavidhaṃ vicikicchaṃ. “Aṭṭhavidhaṃ vā kaṅkhaṃ”ti sattharikaṅkhatītiādinā abhidhamme
analyzed: soḷasavidham vicikiccham aṭṭhavidham vā kaṅkhaṃti sattharikaṅkhati iti ādinā abhidhamme

original: āgataṃ aṭṭhavidhaṃ vicikicchaṃ. Visamahetudiṭṭhi nāma sattānaṃ uppattiyā akāraṇameva
analyzed: āgatam aṭṭhavidham vicikiccham visama hetu diṭṭhi nāma sattānam uppattiyāḥ akāraṇam eva

original: kāraṇaṃ katvā gahaṇadiṭṭhi. “Manasikāravidhī”ti aniccalakkhaṇādīsu manasikāravidhi.
analyzed: kāraṇam katvā gahaṇa diṭṭhi manasikāra vidhi iti anicca lakkhaṇa ādīsu manasikāra vidhi

original: Anupāyabhūto manasikāro nāma niccādivasena manasikāro. Adhimānavatthu nāma obhāsādīni.
analyzed: an upāya bhūtaḥ manasikāraḥ nāma nicca ādi vasena manasikāraḥ adhimāna vatthu nāma obhāsa ādīni

original: “Maggato”ti maggabhāvena. “Amaggato”ti amaggabhāvena. “Dassanañcā”ti tesaṃadhimānavatthūnaṃ
analyzed: maggato ti magga bhāvena amaggato ti amagga bhāvena dassanam ca ati tesam adhimāna vatthūnam

original: aniccatādidassanañca. Tameva visuddhināmāti sambandho. “Sammohamalato”ti catusaccappaṭicchādaka
analyzed: anicca tā ādi dassanam ca tam eva visuddhi nāma ati sambandho sammoha malato ti

original: sammohamalato. Nanu dassananti ñāṇameva. Evaṃsati, ñāṇanti vutte siddhe katvā dassanasaddena
analyzed: sammoha malataḥ nanu dassananti ñāṇam eva evaṃsati ñāṇanti vutte siddhe katvā dassana saddena

original: saha ñāṇadassananti vuttanti āha “etthacā”tiādiṃ. “Sutamayādivasenā”ti sutamaya cintāmayavasena.
analyzed: saha ñāṇa dassananti vuttanti āha ettha ca ati ādim suta maya ādi vasena ati suta maya cintā maya vasena

original: Tattha yathāsutassa pāḷidhammassa atthamattajānanaṃ sutamayaññāṇaṃ nāma. Atthaṃ ñatvā
analyzed: tattha yathā sutassa pāḷi dhammassa attha matta jānanam suta maya ññāṇam nāma attham ñatvā

original: atthānurūpassa sabhāvalakkhaṇassa cintanāvasena uppannaṃ ñāṇaṃ cintāmayaññāṇaṃ nāma.
analyzed: attha anurūpassa sabhāva lakkhaṇassa cintanā vasena uppannam ñāṇam cintā maya ñāṇam nāma

original: “Anumānādiñāṇaṃpī”ti nāmarūpa dhammesu sabhāvānumānaññāṇa sabhāvajānanaññāṇaṃpi.
analyzed: anumāna ādi ñāṇam pi iti nāma rūpa dhammesu sabhāva anumāna ññāṇa sabhāva jānana ññāṇam pi

original: “Attapaccakkhaññāṇamevā”ti attanā paccakkhakaraṇaññāṇameva. “Sabbatthā”ti maggāmaggaññāṇadassanādīsu
analyzed: atta paccakkha ññāṇam eva ati attanā paccakkha karaṇa ññāṇam eva sabbattha āti magga amagga ññāṇa dassana ādīsu

original: sabbesu ṭhānesu. Ettha ca dasasu vipassanāñāṇesupi vipassanā vacanena paccakkhadassanameva
analyzed: sabbesu ṭhānesu ettha ca dasasu vipassanā ñāṇesu pi vipassanā vacanena paccakkha dassanam eva

original: adhippetanti katvā sabbatthaggahaṇaṃ katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Sammasanaññāṇato paṭṭhāya
analyzed: adhippetanti katvā sabbattha gahaṇam katam ti daṭṭhabbam sammasana ññāṇataḥ paṭṭhāya

original: hi dassanameva adhippetaṃ. Na sabhāvajānanamattaṃ. Yato cakkhunā passantasseva suṭṭhu
analyzed: hi dassanam eva adhippetam na sabhāva jānana mattam yatas cakkhunā passantassa iva suṭṭhu

original: paccakkhato dassanatthāya punappunaṃ bhāvanā kammaṃ nāma tattha icchitabbaṃ hoti.
analyzed: paccakkhataḥ dassana tthāya punappunam bhāvanā kammam nāma tattha icchitabbam hoti

original: “Dhammā”ti saṅkhata dhammā. Aniccatā eva lakkhaṇanti aniccalakkhaṇaṃ. Aniccānaṃ vā
analyzed: dhammā ati dhammā anicca tā eva lakkhaṇanti anicca lakkhaṇam vā

original: saṅkhata dhammānaṃ lakkhaṇanti aniccalakkhaṇantipi yujjati. “Abhiṇhasampaṭippīḷanākāro”ti
analyzed: dhammānam lakkhaṇanti anicca lakkhaṇanti pi yujjati abhiṇha sampaṭippīḷana ākāraḥ ti

original: yathā sīghasotāyaṃ nadiyaṃ nāvāya uddhaṃ gacchantaṃ sānāvā abhisaṅkharaṇadukkhena
analyzed: yathā sīghasotā ayam nadiyam nāvāya uddham gacchantam sā anāvā abhisaṅkharaṇa dukkhena

original: abhiṇhaṃ suṭṭhu paṭippīḷeti. Kasmā, asati abhisaṅkhāre taṅkhaṇe eva adhovuyhanato.
analyzed: abhiṇham suṭṭhu paṭippīḷeti kasmai asati abhisaṅkhāre taṅkhaṇe eva adhas vuyhanato

original: Adhovuyhanañhi nāvāya pakati kiccaṃ. Uddhaṃ ārūhanaṃ abhisaṅkhāra siddhaṃ. Evamevaṃ
analyzed: adhovuyhanam hi nāvāya pakati kiccam uddham ārūhanam abhisaṅkhāra siddham evam evam

original: sīghasote saṃsāre attabhāvena uddhaṃ khaṇato khaṇaṃ divasato divasaṃ gacchantaṃ puggalaṃ
analyzed: sīghasote saṃsāre atta bhāvena uddham khaṇataḥ khaṇam divasataḥ divasam gacchantam puggalam

original: ayaṃ attabhāvo abhisaṅkharaṇa dukkhena abhiṇhaṃ suṭṭhu paṭippīḷeti. Kasmā, asati
analyzed: ayam atta bhāvaḥ dukkhena abhiṇham suṭṭhu paṭippīḷeti kasmai asati

original: abhisaṅkhāre, paccayavekalle ca sati, taṅkhaṇe eva vipariṇamanato. Vipariṇamanañhi
analyzed: abhisaṅkhāre paccaya vekalle ca sati taṅkhaṇe eva vipariṇamanataḥ vipariṇamanam hi

original: attabhāvassa pakati kiccaṃ. Uddhaṃgamanaṃ abhisaṅkhāra siddhaṃ. Evaṃ abhiṇha sampaṭippīḷanaṃ
analyzed: atta bhāvassa pakati kiccam uddhaṃgamanam abhisaṅkhāra siddham evam abhiṇha sampaṭippīḷanam

original: veditabbaṃ. Ettha ca saṃsārassa sīghasotatā nāma attabhāvapariyāpannānaṃ nāma rūpadhammānaṃ
analyzed: veditabbam ettha ca saṃsārassa sīgha sota tā nāma atta bhāva pariyāpannānam nāma rūpa dhammānam

original: pavattinivatti sīghatā vuccati. Ettha ca maraṇaṃ duvidhaṃ sammuti maraṇañca paramattha
analyzed: sīgha tā vuccati ettha ca maraṇam duvidham sammuti maraṇam ca

original: maraṇañca. Tattha sammuti maraṇaṃ nāma sammuti saccabhūtassa sattassa maraṇaṃ. Taṃ
analyzed: maraṇam ca tattha sammuti maraṇam nāma sammuti sacca bhūtassa sattassa maraṇam taṃ

original: ekabhavapariyante sandissati. Paramattha maraṇaṃ nāma paramattha saccabhūtānaṃ nāmarūpa
analyzed: eka bhava pariyante sandissati param attha maraṇam nāma param attha

original: dhammānaṃ maraṇaṃ. Idameva ekantamaraṇaṃ, saccamaraṇaṃ, sabhāvamaraṇaṃ hoti. Imasmiṃ
analyzed: dhammānam maraṇam idam eva ekanta maraṇam sacca maraṇam sabhāva maraṇam hoti imasmin

original: vipassanā kamme idaṃ paramattha maraṇaṃ eva aniccatāti ca vuccati. Dhammānaṃ susānakkhettanti
analyzed: vipassanā kamme idam paramattha maraṇam eva anicca tā ati ca vuccati dhammānam susā nakkhettanti

original: ca susānabhūmīti ca vuccatīti. Sā ca susānabhūmināma sattānaṃ paṭisandhito paṭṭhāya
analyzed: ca susānabhūmī iti ca vuccati iti sā ca susānabhūmi nāma sattānam paṭisandhitaḥ paṭṭhāya

original: santānaṃ anubandhatiyeva. Anubandhattā ca sattānaṃ paṭisandhito paṭṭhāya so nāma
analyzed: santānam anubandhatiyā iva anubandhattā ca sattānam paṭisandhitaḥ paṭṭhāya saḥ nāma

original: samayo natthi, yattha sattā na marantīti. Idañca anubandhanaṃ sattānaṃ abhiṇhasampaṭippīḷanameva
analyzed: samayaḥ natthi yattha sattāḥ na maranti iti idam ca anubandhanam sattānam abhiṇha sampaṭippīḍanam eva

original: hoti. Tesaṃ sabbiriyāpathesu jīvitassa ca aṅgapaccaṅgānañca kāyavacīmano kammānañca
analyzed: hoti tesam sa biriyāpathesu jīvitassa ca aṅga paccaṅgānam ca kāya vacī manaḥ kammānam ca

original: sambādhapattito. Avasavattanākāro pana abhisaṅkhāra dukkhaṃ abhiṇhaṃ paccanubhavantānaṃ
analyzed: sambādha pattitaḥ avasavattana ākāraḥ pana abhisaṅkhāra dukkham abhiṇham paccanubhavantānam

original: pākaṭoyeva. Vasavattanehi sati, abhisaṅkharaṇa kiccassa okāso natthi. Vasavattaneneva
analyzed: vasavattanehi sati abhisaṅkharaṇa kiccassa okāsaḥ natthi vasavattanena iva

original: yathicchi tassa kiccassa sampajjanato. Lokasmiñhi sabbaṃpi abhisaṅkhāra kiccaṃ nāma
analyzed: yathicchi tassa kiccassa sampajjanataḥ lokasmin hi sabbaṃpi abhisaṅkhāra kiccam nāma

original: antamaso assāsanapassāsana kiccaṃ upādāya dhammānaṃ vasavattanābhāvato karontīti.
analyzed: antamasaḥ assāsana passāsana kiccam upādāya dhammānam karonti iti

original: Aniccassa dhammassa anuanupassanāti sambandho. “Anuanupassanā”ti ca ñāṇacakkhunā
analyzed: aniccassa dhammassa anuanupassanā ati sambandhaḥ anuanupassanā ati ca ñāṇa cakkhunā

original: punappunaṃ nijjhāyanā olokanā. “Dhammānaṃ”ti pañcakkhandha dhammānaṃ. “Yattha yatthā”ti
analyzed: punappunam nijjhāyanā olokanā dhammānaṃ ti pañcakkhandha dhammānam yattha yattha ati

original: yasmiṃ yasmiṃ sarīraṅge. “Purāṇa dhammānaṃ”ti purāṇānaṃ pātubbhūtānaṃ, vaḍḍhitānañca

original: Sabbete imepañcakkhandhā eva. Ito aññokoci rogo nāma natthi. Tasmā te ekantena rogajātikā

original: saṅkhataṭṭho, santāpaṭṭho, vipariṇāmaṭṭho,ti imehi catūhi dukkhaṭṭhehi. Dukkha kiccehīti
analyzed: saṅkhata ṭṭhaḥ santāpa ṭṭhaḥ vipariṇāma ṭṭhaḥ ti imehi catūhi dukkha aṭṭhehi dukkha kiccehi iti

original: karotīti ca vuttattā. Na hi attānāma atthi, yo attanoti vucceyya. Na ca kattānāma
analyzed: karoti iti ca vutta ttā na hi attā nāma atthi yaḥ attanoti vucceyya na ca kattā nāma

original: atthi, yo karotīti vucceyya. Idha pana tasmiṃ samaye pavattaṃ khandhapañcakameva
analyzed: atthi yaḥ karoti iti vucceyya idha pana tasmim samaye pavattam khandha pañcakam eva

original: attāti ca kattāti ca gahetvā attanoti ca karotīti ca vuttaṃ. “Avassayo hotī”ti patiṭṭhā
analyzed: attā iti ca kattā iti ca gahetvā attanoti ca karoti iti ca vuttam avassayaḥ hoti iti patiṭṭhā

original: hoti. “Vidhamitvā”ti ñāṇena antaradhāpetvā. Sabhāvato vijjamānāni na hontīti dassanañāṇena
analyzed: hoti vidhamitvā ati ñāṇena antaradhāpetvā sabhāvataḥ vijjamānāni na honti iti dassana ñāṇena

original: vinicchayaṃ pāpetvāti vuttaṃ hoti. Bhāvadassanaṃ nāma sokadukkhādīnaṃ abhāvadassanaṃ.
analyzed: vinicchayam pāpetvā iti vuttam hoti bhāva dassanam nāma soka dukkha ādīnam abhāva dassanam

original: “Taṃ taṃ ghanavinibbhujjanavasenā”ti samūhasantati ghanādīnaṃ bhindana chindanavasena.
analyzed: tam tam ghana vinibbhuj jana vasena ati samūha santati ghana ādīnam chindana vasena

original: Tattha samūhaghanabhindanaṃ ādito dhammavavatthānañāṇakiccaṃ. Tadā attadiṭṭhi vikkhambhitā

original: hoti. Jīvadiṭṭhi ca nāma sukhumatarā attadiṭṭhi eva vuccati. Maggakkhaṇaṃ patvā eva
analyzed: hoti jīva diṭṭhi ca nāma sukhumatarā atta diṭṭhi eva vuccati magga kkhaṇam patvā eva

original: tadubhayaṃpi sabbaso samucchindatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. “Paṇihitaguṇassā”ti patthitaguṇassa.
analyzed: tat ubhayam api sabbaso samucchindati iti daṭṭhabbam paṇihita guṇassa ati patthita guṇassa

original: “Pātimokkha”nti ettha “patī”ti jeṭṭhako vuccati. “Mukhaṃ”ti mūlakāraṇaṃ. Pati ca
analyzed: ettha pati iti jeṭṭhakaḥ vuccati mukham ti mūla kāraṇam ca

original: so mukhañcāti patimukhaṃ. Patimukhameva pātimokkhanti imamatthaṃ dassento “taṃ hī”tiādimāha.
analyzed: saḥ mukham ca ati patimukham patimukham eva pātimokkham ti imam attham dassentaḥ tam hi iti ādim āha

original: Sabbalokiyasīlāni nāma catupārisuddhisīlāni. Tesaṃ majjhe. “Jeṭṭhakattā”ti jeṭṭhakasīlattā.

original: dhammānaṃ. “Vipphanditāni nāmā”ti vippakiṇṇāni nāmāti adhippāyo. Tenāha “lolāni nāmā”ti.

original: evaṃ paccuppanne chabbidhā kaṅkhā vuttā. Imā soḷasavidhā kaṅkhāti. Tattha ahosiṃ

original: nu kho, na nu kho ahosinti iminā padadvayena atītakāle attano atthi natthibhāve kaṅkhati.

original: Sace atthi, kiṃ nu kho ahosinti kaṅkhati. Kenaci hetunā paccayena vā ahosiṃ. Kenaci
analyzed: sace atthi kim nu kho ahosin ti kaṅkhati kenaci hetunā paccayena vā ahosim kenaci

original: iddhimantena vā nimmito ahosiṃ. Ahetu apaccayā vā animmito vā sayaṃjāto ahosinti

analyzed: atthaḥ yadi aññatarena ahosim katham nu kho ahosim a pādakā uvā ahosim

analyzed: bhava ādīsu kim idam bhava paramparā vasena vuttam esanayaḥ apara nte pi

original: Paccuppanne “ahaṃ nu kho smi, no nu kho smī”ti yathā khuddakavatthu vibhaṅge aṭṭhasatataṇhāvicaritesu.

original: Satasmīti hoti. Sītasmīti hotīti vuttaṃ. Tattha “satasmī”ti ahaṃ sassato vā bhavāmi.
analyzed: satasmi iti hoti sītasmi iti hoti iti vuttam tattha satasmi iti aham sassataḥ vā bhavāmi

original: nu kho smi. No nu kho smīti kaṅkhati. Tattha “ahaṃ nu khosmī”ti ayaṃ ahaṃ nāma bhavābhavesu

original: nibbānā rammaṇe āvajjanaṭṭhāniyaṃ. “Taṃ”ti gotrabhuññāṇaṃ. Gottaṃ bhavati abhibhavati
analyzed: nibbāna ārammaṇe āvajjana ṭṭhāniyam taṃti gotra bhuññāṇam gottam bhavati abhibhavati

original: chindatīti gotrabhu. Gottaṃ vā abhisambhuṇāti pāpuṇātīti gotrabhūti vacanattho. Kathaṃ
analyzed: chindati iti gotra bhu gottam vai abhisambhuṇāti pāpuṇāti iti gotra bhū ti vacana atthaḥ katham

original: pana gotrabhu cittaṃ gotrabhuññāṇaṃ puthujjanagottaṃ chindati, ariyagottaṃ pāpuṇātīti

original: yujjeyya, sohi puggalo tasmiṃkhaṇe puthujjanagottapariyāpannoevāti. Saccaṃ. Attani
analyzed: yujjeyya saḥ hi puggalaḥ tasmiṃ khaṇe puthujjana gotta pariyāpannaḥ eva ati saccam

original: pana chinnattā sayaṃ chindati nāma. Nibbānassa ca ariyagocarattā taṃ ārammaṇa karaṇavasena
analyzed: pana chinna ttā sayam chindati nāma nibbānassa ca ariya gocara ttā tam ārammaṇa karaṇa vasena

original: ariyagottaṃ pāpuṇāti nāmāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Paccayasattivisesena attano anantare ariyagottaṃ
analyzed: ariya gottam pāpuṇāti nāma ati daṭṭhabbam paccaya satti visesena attanaḥ anantare ariya gottam

original: bhāveti, pātubhāvetīti gotrabhūtipi yujjati. “Paricchijjā”ti paricchinditvā. Diṭṭhivicikicchādīhi
analyzed: bhāva iti pātubhāva iti iti gotra bhūtipi yujjati paricchijjāti paricchinditvā diṭṭhi vicikicchā ādīhi

original: sabbavipphandanehi muñcitvāti vuttaṃ hoti. Sammohassa pahānameva daṭṭhabbaṃ. Na te
analyzed: sabba vipphandanehi muñcitvā iti vuttam hoti sammohassa pahānam eva daṭṭhabbam na te

original: dhamme ārammaṇa karaṇa vasena jānanaṃ. Kathaṃ te dhamme ārammaṇaṃ akaronto maggo
analyzed: dhamme ārammaṇa karaṇa vasena jānanam katham te dhamme ārammaṇam akarontaḥ maggo

original: te dhamme parijānāti nāmāti. Kiccasiddhi vasena. So hi sammohaṃ pajahanto ārammaṇaṃ
analyzed: te dhamme parijānāti nāma ati vasena so hi sammoham pajahantaḥ ārammaṇam

analyzed: karontāni pi hi pubbabhāga ññāṇāni tad pahāna kiccassa asādhaka ttā dukkha saccam parijānantāni iti

original: na vuccanti. Maggo pana ārammaṇaṃ akarontopi tappahānakiccassa sādhakattātaṃ saccaṃ
analyzed: na vuccanti maggo pana ārammaṇam a karontaḥ api tad pahāna kiccassa saccam

original: parijānātīti vuccati. Kasmā. Tato paṭṭhāya tassapuggalassa sabbakālaṃ tasmiṃsacce
analyzed: parijānāti iti vuccati kasmā tatas paṭṭhāya tassa puggalassa sabbakālam tasmin sacce

original: parijānana kiccassa siddhattā. Yathāhi eko puriso cakkhumhi pittasemhādidosehi palibuddhattā
analyzed: parijānana kiccassa siddhattā yathā hi ekaḥ puriso cakkhumhi pitta semha ādi dosehi palibuddha ttā

original: andho hoti. Na kiñci passati. Yadā pana so ekaṃ tejavantaṃ añjanaṃ labhitvā cakkhuṃ
analyzed: andhaḥ hoti na kiñci passati yadā pana so ekam tejavantam añjanam labhitvā cakkhum

original: añjayanto sabbarattiṃ niddāyati. Tassa niddāyantasseva cakkhumhi sabbadosā nassanti.
analyzed: añjayantaḥ sabbarattim niddāyati tassa niddāyantassa iva cakkhumhi sabba dosāḥ nassanti

original: Cakkhu vippasannaṃ hoti. Taṅkhaṇato paṭṭhāya so niddāyantopi rūpāni passatīti vuccati.
analyzed: cakkhu vippasannam hoti taṅkhaṇataḥ paṭṭhāya so niddāyantaḥ api rūpāni passati iti vuccati

original: Kasmā, andhabhāvavigamena dassanakiccassa siddhattā. Evamevamidaṃ daṭṭhabbanti. Ekadesena
analyzed: kasmai andha bhāva vigamena dassana kiccassa siddha ttā evam evam idam daṭṭhabbanti ekadesena

analyzed: vā heṭṭhima maggesu anavasesena vā arahatta magge apacchāvattikam ti ettha pacchatas

analyzed: āvattanam pacchāvattam na atthi pacchāvattam assa ati a pacchāvattikam ti viggahaḥ puna

original: anuppādadhammatāpattivasena nirodhasaṅkhātaṃ”ti maggakkhaṇe eva tānivaṭṭāni puna

original: anuppādasabhāvaṃ āpajjanti, nirujjhanti. Tathā nirodhasaṅkhātaṃ. “Uppādanasaṅkhātāya
analyzed: anuppāda sabhāvam āpajjanti nirujjhanti tathā nirodha saṅkhātam uppādana saṅkhātāya

analyzed: bhāvanāya ati etena maggassa eka citta khaṇika ttā vaḍḍhana saṅkhātāya bhāvanāya okāsaḥ

original: natthīti katvā vuttaṃ. Ariyamaggaṃ paṭilābhatthāya pana pavattitā pubbabhāgabhāvanāpi
analyzed: na atthi iti katvā vuttam ariya maggam paṭilābha atthāya pana pavatti tā pubbabhāga bhāvanā api

analyzed: na tāva hoti iti sambandhaḥ tassa ati tassa puggalassa paccavekkhana vāresu ti ettha

analyzed: ariya bhūtaḥ bhikkhu no laddhum na vaṭṭati iti a laddhum na vaṭṭati iti atthaḥ laddhum

analyzed: tattha kevala saddena param attha saccam patvā attassa iva abhāvataḥ khandha pañcakassa

original: attanovasāyatta vuttitaṃ nivatteti. Sammuti saccaṃ pana patvā attassa vijjamānattā

analyzed: khaṇabhaṅgassa ca a diṭṭha ttā ati etena esaḥ me sāraṭṭhena attā esaḥ mama sāraḥ etam

original: mama sarīraṃ. Yāva vassasataṃpi vassasahassampi etaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ na bhijjati,
analyzed: mama sarīram yāva vassa satam pi vassa sahassam pi etam khandha pañcakam na bhijjati

original: na vinassati. Tāva ahaṃ na marāmi. Yadā etaṃ bhijjati, vinassati. Tadā ahaṃ marāmi.

analyzed: idampanamaraṇam sammuti sacce natthi paramattha sacce eva atthi tasmā tam a passanto

original: mahājano attano khandhapañcakaṃ attanosāraṃ maññamāno eso me attāti gaṇhātīti. “Taṃ
analyzed: mahājanaḥ attano khandha pañcakam attanosāram maññamāno esaḥ me attā ati gaṇhāti iti tam

analyzed: suṭṭhu passantaḥ kevalam paccaya āyatta vutti tañca avasā āyatta vutti tañca suṭṭhu passati

original: Yo ca attano vasāyattavutti na hoti. So paramatthasaccaṃ patvā eso mama santakantipi

analyzed: vattum na arahati kutas mama attā ati api ca satto nāma sabhāvataḥ natthi paññattimattam

analyzed: nāma bhaveyyāti khaṇabhaṅgaḥ hoti khaṇe khaṇe bhijjati satto ca nāma ekasmiṃbhave

analyzed: maraṇam nāma natthi aññā hi khaṇika dhammānam gati aññā sattassa evaṃsante katham

analyzed: khaṇikadhammā sattassa sāra ṭṭhena attānāma bhaveyyunti tasmā te a vasavattana ṭṭhena

original: Atha yathā yathā sattassa vaso vattati, icchā pavattati. Tathā tathā khandhapañcakampi
analyzed: atha yathā yathā sattassa vasaḥ vattati icchā pavattati tathā tathā khandha pañcakam pi

original: niccakālaṃ sattassavasaṃ anugaccheyya. Kasmā, sattassa ca khandhapañcakassa ca vasassa
analyzed: nicca kālam anugaccheyya kasmā sattassa ca khandha pañcakassa ca vasassa

original: ca nānattābhāvato. Evaṃ anugacchante sati. Rūpaṃ me attā, vedanā me attātiādiggahaṇaṃ

original: vaṭṭeyya. Sabhāvato aviruddhaṃ bhaveyya. Na pana tathā anugacchati. Na hi dubbaṇṇo
analyzed: vaṭṭeyya sabhāvataḥ aviruddham bhaveyya na pana tathā anugacchati na hi dubbaṇṇaḥ

original: durūpo puriso attano rūpakāyaṃ attano vaseneva suvaṇṇaṃ surūpaṃ kātuṃ sakkoti. Tathā
analyzed: durūpaḥ purisaḥ attanaḥ rūpa kāyam attanaḥ vasena iva suvaṇṇam surūpam kātum sakkoti tathā

original: dussaddovā susaddaṃ, duggandhovā sugandhaṃ. Na ca andhovā anandhaṃ. Badhirovā abadhiraṃ.
analyzed: dussaddaḥ vā susaddam duggandhaḥ vā sugandham na ca andhaḥ vā an andham badhiraḥ vā a badhiram

original: Rogīvā arogaṃ. Kuṭṭhīvā akuṭṭhaṃ. Gaṇḍīvā agaṇḍaṃ. Jiṇṇovā taruṇaṃ. Ajaraṃ vā amaraṇaṃ

analyzed: vā kātum sakkoti na api apāyesu ca a patantam patitvā vā tatas vimuttam kātum sakkoti

original: Tathā devo vā devattā acāvetuṃ. Sakkovā sakkattā, māro vā mārattā, brahmā vā brahmattāti.

original: Esanayo sesakhandhesupi. Tathā pana avasānugamanato paramattha saccaṃ patvā khandhapañcake
analyzed: sesa nayo sesa khandhesu pi tathā pana avasā anugamanato saccam khandha pañcake

original: attano sāmikiccaṃ issarakiccaṃ nāma natthi. Asāmikameva taṃ hoti, anissaraṃ. Tathā
analyzed: attano sāmi kiccam issara kiccam nāma natthi a sāmikam eva tat hoti a nissaram tathā

analyzed: na paṭivijjhanti tesam parampara paccaya vasena pavattamāne khandha santāne sammuti

original: Tena cittappasādena. “Tena pariyāyenā”ti sace so devesu eva saṃsarati. Sattakkhattuṃ

original: Na diṭṭhivicikicchā sampayuttassa mohassa. Tassa pathamamagge eva pahīnattā. Nāpi

original: Etañhi vattaṃ yaṃ ariyasāvakānaṃ maraṇāsanne sabrahmacārīnaṃ vā upaṭṭhākānaṃ vā appamādakathānu
analyzed: etat hi vattam yam ariya sāvakānam maraṇa āsanne sabrahmacārīnam vā upaṭṭhākānam vā appamāda kathā anu

original: sāsanikammaṃ. Samāpattiyaṃ vā aññatitthiyānaṃ garahā vivajjanatthaṃ. Evañhi te garaheyyuṃ.
analyzed: sāsani kammam samāpattiyam vā añña titthiyānam garahā vivajjana attham evam hi te garaheyyuṃ

original: Gotamasāvakānaṃ nirodhasamāpatti nāma ekaṃ maraṇamukhaṃ. Yaṃ samāpajjanto asuko bhikkhu

original: maraṇaṃ gacchati. Anariya kammaṃ hetanti.
analyzed: maraṇam gacchati an ariya kammam

original: “Yadatthaṃ”ti paṭipatti rasassādatthaṃ. “Tadatthe”ti tasmiṃ atthe. Nirāmisa sukhaṃ
analyzed: yadattham ti paṭipatti rasassa adattham tadattha iti tasmin atthe sukham

original: nāma āmisarahita sukhaṃ. Duvidhañhi sukhaṃ sāmisasukhañca nirāmisasukhañca. Tattha
analyzed: nāma āmisa rahita sukham duvidham hi sukham sa āmisa sukham ca nirāmisa sukham ca

original: ye loke iṭṭha kanta manāpiyā pañcakāmaguṇā nāma atthi. Te kilesehi āmasitabbattā
analyzed: ye loke iṭṭha kanta manāpiyā pañca kāmaguṇā nāma atthi te kilesehi āmasitabba ttā

original: āmisā nāma. Yañcasukhaṃ te āmise paṭicca uppajjati, taṃ sāmisasukhaṃ nāma. Yaṃ loke
analyzed: āmisāḥ nāma yat ca sukham te āmise paṭicca uppajjati tam sa āmisa sukham nāma yam loke

original: dibbaṃ sukhaṃ mānusakaṃ sukhanti mamāyanti. Yañca anubhavantaṃ mahājanaṃ sabbāni
analyzed: dibbam sukham mānusakam sukhanti mamāyanti yat ca anubhavantam mahājanam sabbāni

original: apāyabhaya vaṭṭabhayāni samparivārenti. Jhānasukha maggasukha phalasukha nibbānasukhaṃ

original: pana nirāmisasukhaṃ nāma. Yaṃ nekkhammasukhanti ca pavivekasukhanti ca upasamasukhanti
analyzed: pana nirāmisa sukham nāma yam nekkhamma sukhanti ca paviveka sukhanti ca upasama sukhanti

original: ca sambodhisukhanti ca vimuttisukhanti ca ariyasukhanti ca anavajjasukhanti ca vuccati.
analyzed: ca sambodhi sukhanti ca vimutti sukhanti ca ariya sukhanti ca anavajja sukhanti ca vuccati

original: Yañca anubhavantaṃ ariyajanaṃ sabbāni apāyabhaya vaṭṭabhayāni samparivajjanti. “Assāditabbaṭṭhenā”ti

original: kilesapalibodhehi vimuttattā vipula gambhīra santa paṇītarasattā ca ahosukhaṃ ahosukhanti
analyzed: ca ahosukham

original: udāharantenapi assāditabbaṭṭhenāti.
analyzed: udāharantena api assāditabba ṭṭhena ati

original: Kammaṭṭhānasaṅgahānudīpanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: kammaṭṭhāna saṅgaha anudīpanā niṭṭhitā

original: Nigamagāthāsu.
analyzed: nigama gāthāsu

original: 262. Caritabbanti cārittaṃ. Dasakusalakammapathadhammajātaṃ. “Kulācārenā”ti kulaparamparato
analyzed: caritabbanti cārittam dasa kusala kammapatha dhamma jātam kula ācārena ati kula paramparataḥ

original: āgatena ācārena. “Ñāti mitta dhana bhogasampattiyā”ti hetuatthe karaṇavacanaṃ. “Visāle”ti
analyzed: āgatena ācārena ñāti mitta dhana bhoga sampattiyā iti hetu atthe karaṇa vacanam visālā iti

original: vipule. “Tenā”ti tassapadassa vibhatyanta dassanaṃ. “Saddhāyā”ti ratanattaye aveccappasādasaddhāvasena.
analyzed: vipule tena ati dassanam saddhāya ati rata nattaye avecca ppasāda saddhā vasena

original: “Abhivuḍḍhānaṃ”ti hānabhāgiya ṭhitibhāgiyabhāvaṃ atikkammavisesabhāgiya nibbedhabhāgiya
analyzed: abhivuḍḍhānam ti hāna bhāgiya ṭhiti bhāgiya bhāvam atikkamma visesa bhāgiya nibbedha bhāgiya

original: bhāvapattivasena atissaya vuḍḍhānaṃ. “Parisuddhānañcā”ti attukkaṃsana paravambhanādi

original: dosehi parisuddhānañca. Naṃ naṃ janaṃ pātirakkhatīti nampo. Diṭṭhadiṭṭhesu mettāvihārīti

original: vuttaṃ hoti. Āvhātabboti avhayo. Nāmaṃ. Nampo iti avhayo assāti nampavhayoti vacanattho.

original: adhippāyo. Tenāha “pacchima janānaṃ vā”ti. Anukampanaṃ anukampo. Kathaṃ nu kho ime
analyzed: adhippāyo tena āha katham nu kho ime

original: janā abhidhammatthesu sukhena ājāneyyunti evaṃ pavatto cittabyāpāro. Atthato anudayasaṅkhātā

original: karuṇāyeva. Tenāha “anudayaṃ kāruññaṃ”ti. “Patthitaṃ”ti vā sādhuvatassa yaṃ thero

original: evarūpaṃ pakaraṇaṃ kareyyāti evaṃ cirakālaṃ patthitaṃ āsiṃsitanti attho. “Khuddasikkhāṭīkāyaṃ”ti
analyzed: evarūpam pakaraṇam kareyyāti evam cira kālam patthitam āsiṃsitam ti attho khudda sikkhāṭīkāyanti

original: porāṇaṭīkaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Somavihārotveva paññāyittha tasmiṃ dīpeti adhippāyo.

original: Gāthāyaṃ “athā”ti tasmiṃkāle. “Etthā”ti etasmiṃ nagare. “Saddo”ti kasmā rājā evarūpaṃ

original: maṅgalahatthiṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ adāsi. Netaṃ patirūpaṃ yaṃ raññā katanti evaṃ pavatto
analyzed: maṅgala hatthim brāhmaṇānam adāsi na itam patirūpam yam raññā katanti evam pavattaḥ

original: amanāpasaddo. “Bheravo”ti bhīrutājanako bhayānako. “Sivīnaṃ”ti siviraṭṭhavāsīnaṃ.

original: “Raṭṭhavaḍḍhane”ti raṭṭhaṃ vaḍḍhetīti raṭṭhavaḍḍhano. Hatthināgo. So hi lakkhaṇasampanno
analyzed: raṭṭha vaḍḍhana iti raṭṭham vaḍḍheti iti raṭṭha vaḍḍhanaḥ hatthi nāgo saḥ hi lakkhaṇa sampanno

original: ājāniyo hoti. Yasmiṃ raṭṭhe taṃ abhimaṅgalaṃ karonti, tasmiṃ raṭṭhe devo sammā vassati,

original: Dhanīyanti mahājanehi daṭṭhuṃ patthīyantīti dhaññā. Mahiddhikā. Adhivasanti etthāti

original: udenti uggacchantīti uditā. Uditānaṃpi uditoti viggaho. Tenāha “nabhamajjhe”tiādiṃ.

original: Sārajjanaṃ sārado. Vigato sārado yassāti visārado. Visāradassa bhāvo vesārajjaṃ.
analyzed: sārajjanam sāradaḥ vigataḥ sāradaḥ yassa ati visāradaḥ visāradassa bhāvaḥ vesārajjam

original: Pariyattiyaṃ vesārajjaṃ pariyattivesārajjaṃ. Tepiṭakapariyattiyaṃ veyyattiyaññāṇaṃ.

original: āha “pāpagarahino”ti. Pāpaṃ dhammaṃ garahantiādīnavaṃ kathayanti sīlenāti pāpagarahino.

original: 1. Paramatthadīpanī nāma, yena therena sā katā.
